name: Don't Not Live
description: Don't Not Live is a precision platformer where you can dash in any direction. Climb to the top of the afterlife to meet god and receive the special prize for completing his hellish obstacle course.

name: Laruaville 14
description: Touch the Oriental Wisdom from the ancient sage himself and build him a town!

name: Cyber Prison Management
description: You are tasked with managing 8 prisoners in a flying space prison for 30 days with your camera system. You'll need to manage the stock market, hostile ships, and keep prisoners in line. Or play as one of the prisoners, hiding and trying to escape. But be careful - danger is always around the corner.

name: Click Dungeon
description: This is a turn-based strategy game, Train your fighter, carefully select equipment for him, carefully select the target of attack, and meet the coming elite monsters, Defeat monsters to get loot and improve combat power! Form a team of fighters to fight various bosses!

name: Chinese Chess Wargame
description: This is a new game based on the expansion of the traditional Chinese chess game "Chinese Chess". It not only retains the basic rules of the original Chinese chess, but also adds new war chess elements. You should be able to get started quickly. Take the challenge to become the new master.

name: Absurd Story: Back Home
description: A runaway wanderer, a frail Taoist priest, who want to return to their hometown at the end of the world. But when they step into the empty city, they are swept into the dead ruins…

name: A Nest for Us
description: Fly through the forest collecting twigs to build your nest with in this minimalistic, nature-inspired platformer.

name: Return of Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: Solipsism Reigns BxG
description: Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.
14/? is an exploration game where you explore strange rooms while walking through doors that lead you to other strange rooms.

name: Lily's Memories
description: Lily is an 8-year-old girl who wakes up in her bed at night, hearing voices and strange sounds. The voices tell her that she is in danger and needs to find something important that she lost (her memories of what happened in that house). Lily discovers that apart from the voices, she sees terrifying creatures that try to capture her.

name: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled
description: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled is an upcoming first-person horror game based on Brazilian folklore.

name: Lunr.Rdio.Taxi
description: lunr.rdio.taxi combines the precision of rhythm games with the excitement of a futuristic racing game. Pilot your ship through a mind-bending cylinder that pulses to the beat of the music. Dodge obstacles in time with the soundtrack and master the art of "Drifthm" mode for insane score multipliers. Can you handle the rhythm and the risk?

name: Farm Colony
description: Farm Colony is an upcoming farming simulator RPG where the player controls an alien who is taking care of the planet that was mistreated by the former inhabitants while developing relationships with other races and cultures.

name: The Dreamer Must Die
description: 'The Dreamer Must Die' is an RPG shooter where you're the only hope for a fading dream world. Advance the story, find new equipment, and improve your character within the mind menu to ensure your survival.

name: Biscats
description: Biscats is an upcoming visual novel with erotic themes and female empowerment. The player follows the events after the homonymous comic where Katetoo, an underground tattoo artist from the center of São Paulo, will share her adventures of independent sex and sexual freedom.

name: One Week at Flumpty's
description: One Week at Flumpty's was the original third and final installment of the One Night at Flumpty's series, but it was later canceled and the name was repurposed into the One Week at Flumpty's trilogy of shorts.

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Jollyball
description: Making toys is hard work, and even Santa's elves need a break. Thankfully, the North Pole Elfletic League gives everyone at the Workshop a workout. The Winter Invitational is underway, giving all of Santa's helpers the chance to be crowned seasonal champions of the North Pole's most popular 2-on-2 sport: Jollyball. (It's like standard volleyball, only much cooler.) The teams are ready, the net has been set, the Power-up Presents are primed, and there's fresh snow on the court — are you ready to sleigh the competition?

name: Kirizaki-kun wa.
description: In the classroom of the protagonist, Moriko Taka (changeable), a strange transfer student, Kirizaki-kun, has arrived! Moriko's days with the strange Kirizaki-kun are about to begin.

name: Soleil
description:
The direct sequel of: The Water is Wide.

Many people have tried to find the key to eternal life before, but... This isn't what this game is about. Play the part of Coco, a mysterious ex-orphan trapped inside a world where death exists no more, and where every single human has been blessed with the gift of immortality... if you consider that to be a gift, of course.

Join the main protagonist and their friends in a quest to find the truth behind the strange condition that has been bestowed upon humanity. To make everything the way it was before, or to do nothing about it... That depends on you.

name: Kingsguard
description: Kingsguard is considered a non-linear visual novel so your choices will bring about changes to the story, open up new dialogue, and even affect the ending. To fully understand the story and piece together the mysteries the characters will face, you must play each of the three character paths that will take you to a different corner of Torvair. The choices you make will have consequences and effect the story in various ways.

name: Super Wario & The World of Wirio
description: "Ugh, not again! Scared to death while sleeping this year, too! Some meteor-thingy crashed into a mine nearby, and two Toads want me to check it out for 'em. I bring the meteor home, hoping I can get a bunch of hamburgers for it. But without me knowing it, it absorbs my DNA! And in the night, it creates a shadow clone of me! Luckily, the two stupid Toads are out for a walk when they see this shadow-me. They overhear his plans, and finds out he calls himself for Wirio (how original), and that he is going to return to his own world and prepare to lay our world in shadows. Oh, and that he has 5 shadow-generators or something that will protect him. And after hearing this the next morning, the Toads want me to go into Wirio's world and stop him, blablabla. The only reason I go, is because of treasure...and to stop that thief who stole my good looking face!"

name: Metaverser
description:
Metaverser is a revolutionary new virtual world that offers players the opportunity to explore, create, and interact in a vast and immersive 3D environment. The Metaverser platform is the first of its kind, allowing players to seamlessly switch between different gaming platforms while still earning rewards and progressing in the game.

One of the most unique features of Metaverser is its play-to-earn system. Unlike traditional games where players have to spend real money to purchase virtual items, Metaverser allows players to earn rewards by simply playing the game.

name: Eelbay
description: Mix and match cute eels to fulfill deliveries!

name: Hunters
description: Stompin' Mech Squad!

name: Blocxlide
description: Blocxlide is an arcade puzzle game where players must quickly and strategically slide blocks to create miniature art. Including a puzzle editor and "shuffle" mode, endless brain-scratching challenges await, where only the most efficient will triumph with top grades.

name: Hotel Renovator: DLC Pack 1
description: Customize your hotel with new sets of furniture and rooms! Expand your inner designer experience with this DLC pack and gain access to 6 DLC featuring amazing decoration items that will make your hotel stand out from the rest.

name: Hotel Renovator: Steampunk Furniture Set
description: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Introducing the Steampunk Furniture Set, a DLC that brings retro-futuristic elegance to your Hotel and embraces Victorian aesthetics infused with advanced machinery.

name: Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle
description: Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle is a story about the friendship between a cosmic witch and a shining cat head. Embark on a journey through space to illuminate the darkened stars and restore constellations to the world!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Chara
description: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Chara is an Undertale-related mod for Friday Night Funkin' based around the character Chara. The mod features 3 new songs related to the character.

name: Hop Step Sing! Shikiri Shiishiba: By My Side
description: This time the concept is “Let's hold hands”. While on a date with Shikiri by the seaside in midsummer, you can hold her hands, take photos and create a dream-like VR music video that fans will not be able to resist.

name: Simple Tower Defense
description: A suuuper simple tower defense game with a suuuper simple perk tree.

name: Fantasy Up
description: Join Alf in "Fantasy UP!" in a world upended by a gravity-reversing Demon King. As Alf, ascend, gain experiences, and aim to defeat the Demon King. This RPG tests determination, with average completion of 30-60 minutes. Every fall strengthens you. Ready to climb, Alf?

name: Exo-Leviathan
description: A lone pilot sent to the main asteroid belt, your task is to collect carapaces, dragon remains. But beware, they might not take too kindly to you collecting them. A short sci-fi, first person, indie, thriller/horror game. Triggers my Thalassophobia.

name: Only Cum!
description: You have an important challenge ahead of you to climb to the top! However, if you succeed in doing so, you will receive a very satisfying reward.. The most realistic animations and 3D models are waiting for you to Only Cum!

name: Mother: Encore
description: A re-imagining of Mother with all new content, tweaks and remastered visuals. The soundtrack features remakes from the original game along with brand new pieces! The battle system is also built from the ground up to give each battle a more polished experience. The story adds more depth to the characters you love. The maps have no dead-ends or pesky mazes, and the world is filled with countless little touches to really bring Eagleland to life.

name: Spellsword
description: Spellsword is an interactive web-based game designed to improve our command of the English language.

name: Project Stratarch
description: Project Stratarch is a movement FPS designed around wall jumps, rewarding good movement on top of good aim. There are two game modes, both completely kill-based: Solo Deathmatch (Free-For-All) and Team Deathmatch.

name: Chrome Death
description:
Chrome Death is a hardcore, minimal action game about escape.
Survive for as long as you can in a cyberpunk city and avoiding the CORP AGENTS that have one goal: your destruction. Defeat your friends, earn credits, buy cars and work together with drivers across the world to unlock secret vehicles!

name: Lunar Racer
description:
Strap on your moon boots and fire up your nitro boosters because the real space race is about to begin!!

Shoot, dodge, blast, and nitro boost your way through the solar circuit. Achieve the ultimate prize and conquer the solar system by beating any competitor in your way!
From the creators of Super Stickman Golf.

name: Baja or Bust
description:
From the makers of Motocross Elite comes a whole new game, Baja or Bust—inspired by Mountain Dew Baja Blast, a legendary DEW flavor at Taco Bell that’s finally available in stores, this summer only!
Race through 12 worlds of amazing environments en route to the ultimate destination: Baja. Get on the podium, complete tricks and finish worlds to earn points!

name: Pixel Sweepers
description: Welcome to Pixel Sweepers. A classic, throwback mines game with a twist.

name: Rainbow Rockets!
description: Rainbow Rockets is a purpose built 2 player game to enjoy with friends! With it's unique colour matching control system you'll be addicted in minutes as you start tilting your device to match all the colours of the rainbow to set off your rockets! If you struggle you can always try the tap edition and race against your friends using either version!

name: Death Mile
description: DeathMile is a Co-Op Multi-Player driving/shooting game where you blast your way through Mars!

name: Goofy Insanity
description:
Get in your flying car and take to the air! The city’s traffic cruises down its usual sky-borne lanes, but these wild racers have decided to go in the wrong direction! Take control of one of many unique and colorful vehicles in a traffic-dodging trial against time.
How long does it last? Until you crash. Ranging from a gung-ho granny ready to prove her mettle to an anxious teenager uncertain about the future, these quirky characters are waiting to run the race. Avoid police, garbage trucks, school buses, and more, and see how long you can stay in the sky of this futuristic city. Keep racing to try to beat your time, and earn coins to unlock new characters and cars.

name: Down the Hill!
description: Down The Hill is a unique and fast-paced arcade game that will keep you hooked for hours. The goal of the game is to descend from an infinite hill, while avoiding many obstacles and enemies, and grabbing stars and power-ups.

name: Lion Pig: Frozen Run
description:
Lion Pig: Frozen Run is a free-to-play endless runner / platform adventure set in a beautiful pixel world. It's time to put on your running shoes because Lion Pig is ready to race through the Frozen Valley! Run and jump as fast as possible while avoiding traps such as giant snowballs and crystal shards. Be careful not to fall down a snow pit while gazing upon the frost-covered trees and mountains as the sun and moon pass over the horizon. The game has a beautiful retro style and some charming winter music you will surely fall in love with.
This is is the ultimate test for your racing skills. Upgrade your score multiplier and keep running to earn the highest score on the Leaderboards!

name: 90 Seconds
description: You have to reach the exit within 90 seconds in levels with tough obstacles. With its ease of playing and stage designs with plenty of action spy cars will save the world thanks to you. Both race and action are waiting for you. 5 cars are available for you to select. Drive whichever you like and collect golds. With its lifelike car checks you can choose out of two different checking options.

name: Just Get Z
description: Just Get Z is about starting at A and getting to Z. clicking to match two similar letters together to get to the next letter for you to get on top of the scoreboard. Simply match A's with colorful tiles together to form B's, while matching B's to C's and so on till you get to Z. Challenging right? The higher alphabet you match, the greater you keep going on top of the scoreboard. As you play, the lively colors on the screen brighten up your mood and the sweet music soothes your ears keeping you in a kind of meditation mode making you concentrate and focused, but this fascinating game brightens the brain cells to the core.

name: L for Logic
description: Guess the logical chain and connect the images in order.

name: Rotate the Rings
description: This is an exciting puzzle game where the player needs to solve different challenges by rotating the rings to find the gap.

name: Point 236
description: Your task is to capture back a curative spring. Many enemies attack you, all in full 3D environment.

name: Cook, Serve, Delicious: Re-Mustard!
description: The million-selling cooking sim is BACK in this all new re-imagining of a classic! An all new campaign, expanded music, new foods and art, and new gameplay modes round out a celebration of the ten year anniversary of this massive series.

name: Battle Tea
description: Battle Tea is a simple yet competitive word game where you fight against your friends until there's only one man standing. Play up to 8 players, or find people to play online. Are you tea master you may think your are?

name: Marbloid
description:
Travel through the Vaporwave and reach the Exit – MΔRBLΘID is a 3D marble racing game like no other!

Play the restless mind of an entrepreneur, captured in a magical marble who needs to reach his ultimate goal: The Exit!

name: Arcane Depths
description: Arcane Depths is a 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler game with a magical world. Become a powerful sorcerer and dive into dangerous depths filled with enemies and treasures. Combine a multitude of spells and relics to annihilate your foes. Procedurally generated dungeons, intense combat, and powerful bosses awaits!

name: Blackout
description: Blackout is a hardcore co-op zombie shooter where you become a future special forces team and must overcome mysterious monsters and living corpses. Experience devastating action and extreme teamwork. It's up to you to complete the mission and eliminate the ruthless monsters without fear of death

name: Set Sail!
description: Set Sail! is a top-down, 4 Player Couch Co-op Pirate Party Adventure. Adventure with up to 3 friends and learn the ropes of being a pirate, sailing your ship, collecting treasure and fighting monsters, menaces, or each other, with our PvP system Desertion...

name: Casino of Desire
description: Casino, money, beauty girls, desire, everything is superficial, hidden behind a huge conspiracy.

name: Nūr
description: Nūr is a heartfelt 2D adventure game with hand-drawn visuals that takes players on an emotional journey of imagination, empowerment, and resilience.

name: Only One
description: Immerse yourself in the chilling world of Only One, a spine-tingling horror experience that will leave you trembling with fear. Explore the depths of a haunted mansion, where darkness reigns and secrets lurk in every corner. Uncover the truth behind the paranormal occurrences.

name: Haunted Mansion
description: Hunt treasures in spooky manors!, evade ghosts, and unravel secrets.

name: RoboRancher
description: RoboRancher is a first-person open-world co-op game with touches of exploration. In which you can capture and raise adorable monsters and get the resources they generate to improve your facilities, enter the planet and discover the secrets that await you.

name: Screen King
description: Screen King is a grid-based puzzle game where you need to merge your tiny LCD screen with the other LCD screens in the level and be the last one standing.

name: Residence
description: Kailin does her yoga training every day to stay fit for her upcoming sexfights. However today Yanmei took a place on Kailin’s spot….and it was a mistake. Girls start to argue who is the best here and whose body is more fit.

name: The Road to Recovery: A Personal 2D Adventure Game
description: The Road to Recovery places you in the shoes of Ash, a recovering addict, starting at day one. Awoken by the sound of your phone ringing, you have ZERO memory of the night before. Explore Oakborough City, and "survive" day one!

name: Z Zombies: Battle Royale
description: A challenging battle royale that will test you and make you decide quickly and wisely! Shoot those pesky zombies and the other players in the arena as quickly and tactically as possible!

name: Eonia Revelations
description: Take on the role of Blin Albius, the last Knowledge Seeker apprentice, and sort through the most exotic plants, minerals, and animals, in a vast and colorful fantastical world. Unravel the truth behind the great powers of the world and the secrets that rule everything.

name: Doubumon
description: Doubumon is an RPG monster collecting/battling game. Experience tactical battles as you choose 4 Doubumon to fight with on the battlefield. Grow, evolve, and customize your attacks while developing different strategies in order to win, as you fight and explore your way to become the Doubumon champion.

name: Bl00d.exe
description: The year is 2099 and Daydream, New Jersey is under corporate rule. Corporate Killers determine the fate of who lives and who dies. Become Sam Boone, Harmoney's star Corporate Killer, and go on a path of vengeance and violence in this retro inspired, cyberpunk boomer shooter.

name: Kingdoms
description: Fight for your Kingdom! Collect unique pieces, form a powerful army, and defeat opponents in action-packed turn-based battles. Utilize strategy and tactics to outsmart your enemies and capture their Commander, before they capture yours.

name: Smash Runner
description: Smash, Run, Jump & Shoot!

name: Invaders
description: Defend humanity against alien invasion, in a roguelike world where you will have to make decisions and try to form the best deck in order to handle the difficulties. Try to get the highest score in each level, develop your skills, your deck and beat the different champions.

name: Black Box LSS: The Merciful Savior
description: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends love, crime, and romantic comedy. A story of a young man forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love. If you're a fan of love story, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

name: Tower Builder
description: Tower Builder is online Co-op or single player building and design game.

name: Neon Runner
description: Test yourself on the neon lit tracks of Neon Runner. A fast paced runner style game that requires speed and precision to complete all levels as quickly as possible and set a high score.

name: Curfew
description: Curfew is a first-person stealth horror game set in a surreal town gripped by a mysterious plague and crushed under the boot of a totalitarian regime. Uncover an ancient conspiracy that threatens the very survival of the population.

name: Omen
description: Embark on a journey in "One Man's Eternal Night," a 3D adventure game. As Prince Omen, betrayed and cursed into a vampire, traverse a haunting world, solve puzzles, and combat monsters. Will you reclaim your lost throne or succumb to the eternal night?

name: Slam Dunk Basketball 2
description:
Sale continues! Celebrating 70 top ten rankings worldwide for iPhone and iPad, Slam Dunk Basketball continues to do more and get better.
Hustle for cash, level up, play in tournaments and become the Basketball Champion! Play with people from all over the world and become the world’s best basketball player!

name: Life's Too Short!
description: Life's Too Short! A 1-minute life simulator: Birth, Life, Death, in 60 seconds! Roll, toddle, bounce, climb and clamber through a colourful, hand-made world. Be anyone, do anything, but remember: time flies when you're having fun...

name: Onslaught
description: A 2D hack and slash where you rapidly switch between three characters to decimate waves of enemies! Fight your way through dangerous areas, each with unique monsters and bosses.

name: Boss Rush Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Mystery Bundle
description: Murder! A fabulously wealthy game designer is found dead outside a castle in rural Vermont, and soon evidence shows that this was not merely a freak accident attributed to local superstition. Now it's up to you to investigate and apprehend the guilty. Play as unlikely partners -- ace sleuth Detective Guy and Cleo the clue-sniffing dog to explore the castle grounds, search for clues, and question suspects. Can you solve the case?

name: Bird Tale
description:
Our young birds, recently born, are preparing their first challenge in life, to learn how to fly! This is where you'll need to help them.
With one touch easy mechanic, touch the screen to make them flap their wings. Not so easy though, the forest they are is filled with obstacles including trees, spikes and forest folks such as Bee.
Through your way, you'll collect fruits and our birds love them! Better, you can use them to unlock new baby birds, themes and features through the store!

name: Turtle Run: Crood Islands of Oz
description: Adventure with the fastest Turtle in Oz! Race him across the islands to reach the tower in this fun filled runner. Beware of nasty wizards and goblins! Will you make it out of Oz?

name: Golf Putt 3D
description: Golf Putt brings the ultimate golf experience to your device. 3D environment & beautiful greenish outfield gives your spine a chill and the sporty thrill. Time the ball perfectly to make it to the hole. Different slopes makes the game a challenge to play.

name: Osmos+
description:
Enter the Darwinian world of a galactic mote. Grow by absorbing smaller motes—but beware of being absorbed yourself.
Osmos+ features unique physics-based play, stellar graphics, and a hypnotic ambient soundtrack.
Navigate through floating playgrounds, competitive petri dishes, deep solar systems, and more.
The key is to balance mass and movement: to propel yourself you must eject matter behind you, causing you to shrink. Use it wisely.
Whether you're a child at heart who likes mucking about with single-cell organisms, or a strategist with a physics degree, this game is for you.

name: Top Jump
description: Climb fast, reach the top! In Top Jump, race through a perilous cave to dominate the leaderboard. Time can be rewound in training, but in ranked mode, use it wisely to avoid losing precious seconds. Precision, speed, and strategy are key in this addictive vertical challenge!

name: Cooking Simulator 2: Better Together
description: Cooking Simulator is back – bigger, better, and with optional multiplayer! Create your own recipes and take advantage of new and improved controls to become the best restaurant cook in the city! Or just have fun and enjoy cooking at your own pace. You’re the chef here!

name: Beauty Crush
description: game challenges players' powers of observation, reaction speed, and strategic thinking. Whether enjoyed in short bursts or as a long gaming session, this game offers enjoyment and challenges that entice players to return and push their limits time and again.

name: Black Silk Girl
description: This is a casual masturbation girl game. You're flying a plane in space looking down on Earth when a bunch of alien spaceships fire at you. You have to survive. As a reward, survive to the end, and you will see the Black Silk Girl. Head out into space!

name: Bloc-Age: Path of the Oracle
description: A story driven fast paced action FPS with a retro twist.

name: Furry Futanari Jigsaw 2
description: Be a good girl or boy and have fun with this sexy futanari puzzle game.

name: Sleepy Time Jack: Digital Talking Body Pillow
description: Fall asleep to the soothing sound of your Sunny Day Jack's voice as he praises and comforts you in this Digital Talking Body Pillow app!

name: Packet.Breach()
description: Packet.Breach() is a strategy roguelike where you place hacker program towers to manipulate, duplicate, and teleport enemy projectiles to destroy security programs. Add towers to your deck as you progress and develop your own strategy—and uncover the truths behind the mega corporation's agendas.

name: Xero
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled world of Xero, a high-octane platform game that thrusts you into the cockpit of a futuristic fighting robot! Strap on your jetpack, power up your lasers, and unsheathe your razor-sharp swords as you prepare for the ultimate battle.

name: Tensei Brave
description: Due to the invasion of the Demon Lord, countries around the world have been destroyed. In the last remaining country, a hero is summoned. Players control the hero, gather allies, and set out on a journey to defeat the Demon Lord. Can the seemingly weak protagonist indeed vanquish the Demon Lord?

name: Blamed
description: Blamed is an adult detective game in the visual novel genre. Walk the path of Detective David Fox and unravel a series of mysterious murders happening in the city. Make choices and influence the course of the investigation, conquer girls, and catch criminals.

name: Hero of Luxuria
description: Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Hero of Luxuria. Save the world from the danger hanging over it.

name: Kingdom Square
description: A tile-based minimalist city-building and automation game set in the middle ages.

name: Stickfigurez
description: Stickfigurez is an indie platform fighter featuring iconic characters from classic stick figure animations. Play with up to 4 players locally or online!

name: Project Apparition
description: Project Apparition is a 4 player cooperative paranormal investigation game currently in development. The aim of the game is to take on missions to investigate and remove ghosts from haunted buildings.

name: Stand Your Ground
description: Stand Your Ground is an immersive tactical FPS game where you must defend yourself from armed attackers. Play as an American Civilian, who is well within their right to legally own and use a firearm, and fight your way out of situations inspired by actual events - or let the attackers take over.

name: Skyguard 0: Air Arcade
description: Skyguard is a single player arcade flight combat game with stylized graphics and fast-paced gameplay. Switch between different squadrons, shred enemy in dogfight, engage groups of enemy with multi-lock weapons.

name: Hop n Pee Dreams VR
description: Hop n Pee Dreams VR is a spirited platformer bursting with innovative VR mechanics. Embark on a short dream through cylindrical platforms as you hoard beers, dodge barrels, and search for relief amidst rock, funk and the sublime Clair de Lune! Strap in for a pee-rific adventure!

name: Land of Borealia
description: Jump, leap, glide, and build as you take on the threat of the Dark Dragon in this innovative combo of 3D puzzle platformer and tower defense. Traverse the mythical Land of Borealia, complete puzzles, and play minigames to grow your arsenal against the Dragon’s minions!

name: Football Streaker Simulator
description: We all thought about it, and now you can give it a try. Run onto the football field, take a selfie with your favorite player, escape from a huge crowd of stewards, and disrupt the game for the entire stadium. What could be better?

name: Joy Life
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: Memory Wonderland: Bond
description: This game is a maze exploration RPG that combines features such as strategic combat, puzzle-solving adventure, collectibles, and emotional storylines to provide an engaging gaming experience with beautiful scenery.

name: Internet Addicted Youth 2005
description: Netjunker 2005 is a story-oriented role-playing game that incorporates a variety of scenario-appropriate gameplay. You will play the role of Wang Xiaoleng, and face the criticism of Internet addiction and games from teachers, classmates and parents in the early 20th century.

name: Tap City
description:
Get ready to be part of the city revolution with Tap City!
Prove your building skills with the stunning tap adventure through the most emblematic cities in the world. Start from a scratch with a quiet residential neighbourhood, and reach the summit building the most impressive skyline that humankind has ever seen. Progressing in our hard world has evolved to an amusing journey. Don't worry about aggressive rival strategies and focus on delighting yourself with the awesomeness of your streets.

And remember, cities are not only about buildings! Cities are also about life, movement and the happiness of their citizens. Discover new vehicles, furnish the streets and clean the air with plants and trees. Every small effort counts when building a legendary capital. While your city improves, new challenges will arise. Rise your civilization to the top by improving your technologies.

In Tap City you will be able to upgrade your city with 100+ building evolutions, 20+ vehicles to discover and tens of unique city decorations. All these through 50+ world cities from all around the globe with 16 technology upgrades.

name: Lion Bubble Tosser: The Queen of the Safari
description:
This is classic bubble shooter game. Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Zimba is love to play with her bubbles. Help her to reach her goals.

name: FastBall 2 F.
description:
Over 6 million players are enjoying FastBall 2, now it's your turn to taste it...
FastBall is back and is faster, fun and addictive than ever...
In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen.
With this simple mechanic, FastBall 2 contains 155 action packed levels spawned across 5 level packs. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end.
It is easy to play and easy to enjoy....

name: Scribble Worm
description:
Draw worms with your fingers and watch them come to life in this new puzzle game! Avoid the red walls, bounce off the blue walls, slide on the gray walls. Watch out: some walls move! Pattern anticipation and timing are a must in this challenging and addictive puzzle game.
Challenge your friends in the 2-player head-to-head mode. Race your worms to reach the apple first, and collect the GameCenter achievements.

name: Muster my Monsters
description:
Have a blast fighting in the arena of this hilarious 4-player party game for the entire family. To deal with this bunch of monsters, the key is to have rapid reflexes, good intuition and master the art of bluffing. And don't forget mocking at your rivals whenever you win!

Muster my Monsters mechanics are based on a rock-paper-scissors gameplay design and are really simple. Each player controls a monster and every monster is able to perform 3 different actions: Attack, Mock and Dodge. Attack beats Mock, Mock beats Dodge and Dodge beats Attack. The player who manages to KO all the rivals wins the combat!

name: Space Cantina
description:
Match, squeeze, mix, serve! Great music, incredible visuals, cute planets. Explore space, open your restaurant and become the best bartender!
Become the best bartender throughout in the music themed universe. Dozens of ingredients to mix, hundreds of customers to serve is waiting for you behind the doors! Explore the vast space and discover new planets as you go. More than 20 space ships are waiting for you to begin your journey. Play with your friends through facebook or compete with them through leaderboards.
More than 70 levels to play with bonus levels waiting for you upon completing each planet, and more levels on the way! Earn high scores and rewards.

name: Desert Force: Rescue Mission
description:
Special mission to the special force to handle a war in the land of middle east. You are a special man in this force who are given difficult task to handle the war in the middle east.

You must use good tactics and your skills to fight the enemy. And you must be careful from the terrorist.

Complete the deadly missions in the land of middle east, to fight the terrorist.
There are 15 stages of different difficulty levels, play and feel the tense atmosphere when you fight the enemy forces.

name: Vs. Racing
description: Experience the thrill and excitement of full-on arcade racing.

name: Hondune's Truck Trials
description: Hondune's Truck Trials is a game that sets itself apart from other driving games. This time it's not all about speed, but rather pure skill, concentration, and a little luck. The goal is to get as many of the 4 crates you start with to the finish 'zone'. Each crate counts as a 1000 point bonus to an otherwise falling score. Each time you pass a level you unlock the next level, and possibly a new vehicle! Compete locally and globally to gain the highest score on each of the 40 levels! Then take your unlocked vehicles and hone your skills in the free ride arena!

name: Lightspeed Bit Bit
description:
Lightspeed Bit Bit is a unique retro neon stylized arcade game. The simple one finger control makes it easy for anybody to pick up and play, but it's also challenging without being frustrating. This game has three awesome game modes.
◊Bit Bit Mode: This is the main mode of the game. There are three difficulties-Easy, Medium, and Insane. Your ship loses a little bit of health every second and also when you collect the wrong color bit. You must collect bits that match the color of your ship to add to your health and score.

name: Dickland: Racing
description: Dickland: Racing is a two-player arcade action racing game! The main feature among such races is the amazing pipe world and the physicality of the game characters!

name: Daybreakers
description: On that day, you finished your work and returned to your apartment as usual, but unexpectedly, you involved in a large-scale conspiracy. Horrifying explosions, mysterious virus, and encounters with unfamiliar beautiful girls one after another...

name: Mujina
description: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends or anyone online to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: WCP Word Girlfriend
description: A game that combines visual novel elements with gameplay for vocabulary memorization. With this game, we offer an exciting adventure that transforms word learning into an enjoyable and rewarding experience. Join us now to explore the joy of English learning in this visually immersive game!

name: Crowned
description: Crowned is a fast-paced tactical role-playing game with a focus on environmental interactions and distinct unit skills over big numbers. Follow the bold warrior Balta as he gathers an eclectic bunch of allies to defeat all that stand in his way to claim the Crown of Lazur.

name: 60 Clicks: Read, Select, Connected Worlds
description: This is a Short Visual Novel, that ends the story by your 60 clicks, and in full Live2D animation. Choose the options that appear again and again, to interact with the heroine. Repeat the story, understanding the mysteries, and fall in love with her.

name: Halcyon: The WaveBorn
description: Halcyon is a Roguelite with Deck-Building mechanics that uses an isometric camera. In the game you will use a deck of cards to move the character and another deck of cards to perform attacks and defenses, while trying to survive level after level.

name: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator
description: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator is a sequel to the warmly received Prison Simulator, but with an unusual twist - you're no longer a prison guard. You are the prisoner! Steal, sell drugs make deals with the guards, - whatever suits you, prepare for hardships you have never seen before!

name: All Chess
description: Create, collect and play board games from around the world, you can customise board sizes, piece moves and their unique look. There's 1 board game I've created, 20+ classic board games and countless future games of yours!

name: Re/terra
description: Journey across a post-apocalpytic world as you race to find the key to the future before the food runs out

name: Lazy Jiangshi
description: A visual novel about lazy jiangshi Mao and her even lazier mistress.

name: Pavephobia
description: Pavephobia is an action game where you decide how the level builds up. You choose whether you want to encounter a trap or an enemy next. It's up to you. You want to know more? Then go to Pavephobia!

name: Bare Knuckle Sandwich
description: Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D fighting game with side-scrolling exploration and a character-driven narrative. BKS tells the story of a young, directionless guy, Gunner, who joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring.

name: RunNCrush
description: RunNCrush is a party platformer game where you play your friends in various mini games. Try your hand at soccer, racing, and more, while crushing your pals!

name: Escape From Exile
description: Escape From Exile is a Story Driven Survival game you can enjoy with your friends. By following the immersive story and fighting the mobs you find along it. Build bases, farm food and survive the night and maybe you will Escape from Excile!

name: Gothel
description: An online Sci-Fi Action RPG set deep in a futuristic military complex, built to generate an endless steam of AI-powered killing machines. Fight your way out from its deep depths, solo or with friends, to discover why you alone have the freedom of choice, and ultimately, stop whoever runs the place.

name: Heavy Sword
description: Heavy Sword is an action adventure Platformer with some RPG elements. Imagine if you took some of the best parts of Zelda II NES, Super Mario World SNES and fused them into something new! Take Control of Pike in his quest to rid the land of horrendous monsters!

name: Hot Worlds
description: Fight. Learn. Team up. Win. Fighting her way through inter-dimensional arenas and escapades, Val the all-star fighter must defeat baddies and amass her crew along her way to win fame in not just one, but every world.

name: Space Tales
description: Space Tales is a real-time strategy game set in a retro-futuristic environment. Take on the role of a commander in the Intergalactic Planetary Expansion (I.P.E.) and immerse yourself in a thrilling mission to explore and conquer new planets, pushing the boundaries of the Human Empire.

name: Rebirth Moment
description: At the end of the world where alien bugs and zombie thugs run rampant, you are a special "bug slayer" who was sent to an unknown town to perform a final mission. As one of the executors of the "Rebirth Plan", you must find the "Reborners", protect them, and survive as long as possible...

name: Bizzy Robo
description:
If you are looking for a game that will really push your limits, make you think beyond the line and enjoy the numerous challenges that only logic and sharp mind solves, Bizzy Robo is the ideal game for you!

Stunning graphics in space environment, 10 different stations and 100 levels to repair, cute little Robos that need your help in pushing the objects into right places limited by moves, only clever decisions and the most persistent players can succeed.
The race to the top has began, lets see who can make it till the end!

name: Tweaked Revolution
description: Tweaked Revolution is a true street racing game with unmatched levels of car customization in the AppStore.

name: Playroom Racer 2
description: Small cars, big fun! Playroom Racer 2 is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

name: Da Paper Boy
description: Get locked and loaded as 3 Teens run through the town delivering mail in a whole new modern way! As you generate points on the leaderboard while dodging OG granny and the neighborhood watch. Only one question remains... Are you the best paper boy or paper girl? Let your score tell it all!

name: My Unusual Feline Friend
description: From another dimension, a strange and very cute catgirl visits you. She is very curious how sex works in this dimension and she has chosen you to teach her all about it!

name: Jarpug
description: Jarpug is a JRPG about a pug with a jar on her head. Help Pug and her friends explore a 3D platformer world and fight in turn-based RPG battles. Designed for VR and flat screens, either way is a great way to play! Explore the magical, fantastic world of the modern dog.

name: Baro Kart
description: Help Baro and his friends to save the universe from the evil witch doctor, race is the main challenge, and you are the savior.

name: The Mice Plight
description: Escape a treacherous labyrinthine prison by outsmarting guards in tactical card-based battles. Pick your abilities before each encounter, tailoring your strategy. Defeat guards to steal their skills, navigate deadly traps, and unleash your cunning to secure your freedom.

name: World Guesser
description: World Guesser is a multiplayer party royale game where you and your fellow contestants compete to deliver packet to successive target countries for the sake of being the last one to remain. It's a battle royale concept geography game that sends you on a plane trip around the earth.

name: Exorcist Simulator
description: Exorcist Simulator is an immersive multiplayer horror game that will captivate players and immerse them in a world of supernatural events and dangers.

name: Path of Ascension
description: Introducing Path of Ascension. The latest game from Undermax Games. Combining elements of classic RPG's with some Rouguelike content and the freedom to choose your own path, we have developed this simple but innovative project.

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 8
description: Episode 8 contains 5 new positions for your excitement.

name: Nusantara Adventures
description: Grow in virtue or infamy amongst others as you fight your way to become an infamous guild in a roguelike procedurally generated unique world of Nusantara.

name: Martial Arts Peerless War
description: This is a horizontal version of the machine street clearance/combat gameplay, featuring multi character AI development, editing combos, and action strategy games for battles in large scenes.

name: Tribe Quest
description: Embark on a perilous Quest! Load up your wagon with resources, craft tools & weapons, face dangerous enemies and survive! Explore diverse landscapes, uncover ancient secrets. Triumph against all odds in this unforgettable journey!

name: Specter
description: A Simplistic Ghost Hunting Game.

name: Bandit Knight
description: Step into the boots of a master thief in Bandit Knight! Outsmart enemies, steal legendary treasures, and navigate a vibrant 2.5D pixel world. Customize your tools, unlock upgrades, and rise to become the ultimate King of Thieves!

name: Pin Crasher
description: Pin Crasher is an exciting and unique casual game that combines the classic sport of bowling with the fast paced action of endless runners.

name: Cross Seekers
description: Sin descripción

name: Trade Post Forest
description: Trade Post Forest is an open world exploration game about a successful trade post in the middle of the woods. Explore the trade post and the surrounding land to discover new landmarks and tools. Don't get lost.

name: Project Vostok
description: "Project Vostok" is a non-linear horror visual novel about a group of airplane crash survivors finding a mysterious Soviet-era bunker in Altai mountains. Uncover a story full of drama, horrors and decide the fate of diverse cast of characters in this visual novel.

name: Foot Fashion Simulator
description: Be a foot fashion stylist!

name: Just in Crime
description: Just in Crime is a detective video game in which you play a detective dog and a wizard cat. With a twist; you are able to travel back in time and examine the crime scene a few seconds before it happened.

name: ShantyTown
description: ShantyTown is a relaxing city-block builder where you place objects according to adjacency bonuses to create a colorful and atmospheric urban diorama.

name: Galaxy Hordes
description: Galaxy Hordes is an Action-Roguelike where you fight off waves of aliens across various unique planets. As you level up choose skills and passives to create a different build every run. Survive until the time is up and return to your ship with recourses to unlock permanent upgrades.

name: Provoron
description: It's an adventure game about black&white crows.

name: Stack-Making Neighbors
description: Stack-Making Neighbors is a casual physics-based puzzle game. Remove blocks from a tower, and carefully stack them on top. Play alone, or with friends.

name: Skade
description: Upon her fathers' death, a young Jotunn woman swears vengeance upon the gods and begins a journey towards Asgård.

name: Sparky
description: Help the robotic dog named Sparky complete the mission!

name: Cube Kingdoms
description: You are the Lord of a small village in a medieval fantasy world. Build your kingdom by expanding your economy, defending yourself, recruiting troops, making your people happy (or not), all while your neighbors are breathing down your neck.

name: Midnight Havoc
description: Midnight Havoc is a top-down pixel art game with a simple premise... kill!! Play as a recluse who has been cursed with the mark of the beast. Hunt your prey, consume their heart, and grow stronger. Will you be a terrifying predator lurking in the shadows or a bloodthirsty monster tearing apart all?

name: Inner Seasons
description: Inner Seasons is a first person platformer with speed slide gameplay. Dash, jump, crouch and dodge walls flying at you with precise timing to progress. Slide through the seasons of life playing as River and learn from your mentor, Farley.

name: Morganica
description: Morganica is a first–person adventure with horror and action elements. Young man, abducted from the World of the Living, is forced to survive in a gloomy otherworldly City, which is controlled by the Demons of Evil. He is surrounded by people like him, as well as zombies and monsters.

name: Titanic Terror
description: A submarine touring the Titanic has gone missing. As part of the coast guard, you have been called in to locate and rescue the crew before their oxygen runs out.

name: Epic Cards Battle 3
description: The latest free-to-play online strategy TCG battle card game. Each card is exquisitely designed. A balanced and fair competitive arena for TCG and CCG enthusiasts. Shine in various modes such as Ladder (PvP), Campaign (PvE), Roguelike, Guild Wars, League, Friendly Match, and Custom Match.

name: Saviour of the Wasteland
description: Saviour of the Wasteland is a very NSFW adult, interactive visual novel. Scavenge resources, build your settlement, meet lots of new people, discover secrets and have lots of sex while navigating the challenges of the wasteland.

name: The Onkilons
description: A top-down action adventure combining a rich story of brave explorers with intense combats against mythical creatures and a hostile cave tribe (stealth is also a choice). Fight, solve puzzles to explore the island and meet the local mysterious inhabitants known as the Onkilons.

name: Stormbane
description: A third person medieval multiplayer RPG where you create your own legend, the story is unwritten, your destination is unknown, 50 gold in your pocket, a sword, and the wild lands in front.

name: Bankwave: Neon Networth
description: Inspired by cyberpunk and synthwave influences, Bankwave: Neon Networth is a narrative-based customer-service simulation with escape room elements. The game features dozens of quirky characters, multiple endings, and an immersive paperwork simulation.

name: Re:Night
description: Re:Night is a roguelike deck-building & turn-based strategy game. Lead your team, slay monsters, collect loot, and defeat bosses. Utilize elemental power and tactical wisdom to end the loop of nights and bring back the dawn!

name: Grid Runner
description: VR ONLY. Drive your flying car at 500 MPH, weaving through traffic and avoiding the police. Enjoy the atmospheres of rainy, future noir nights and sunny, cab-driving days as you cruise to an original synthwave soundtrack or your own custom playlist. It's time to fly.

name: Laura of Reigetsu
description: There was a girl named Laura who lived in a remote village called Hatayaki. She was close friends with a girl named Lunaroa who lived next door, and they promised to marry in Yuriscene, a country where women can marry each other.

name: Match, Talk, Date!: A Modern Dating Sim!
description: 'Match, Talk, Date!' is a dating sim where you use a dating app to chat to a diverse cast of characters. You decide what to say and how the conversation goes. Can you convince them to go out on a date with you, or are you going home alone?

name: My Cozy Home
description: My Cozy Home is a relaxing house building game where you get to build the house you always dreamed of. The game offers a huge library of items to create a bedroom or a kitchen or a gaming room or anything you can dream of. Choice is yours.

name: Tap Romantics
description: In this casual strategy game, become a clever warrior, eliminate monsters by clicking, accumulate attack power, battle against beautiful girl enemies, earn talent points and exquisite CG rewards, and challenge your decision-making wisdom and combat skills!

name: Heaven's Dream
description: Become an incubus and enter a girl's dream! As an incubus, you need to enter a girl's dream to get energy in order to live. That energy is sexual pleasure energy. The desires that girls hide... I want to be forced i want to be violent Satisfy the girl's hidden desires!

name: Talker Tales
description: In Talker Tales, a roguelike deck-building game, there's no combat, only verbal sparring! Travel with your apprentice, collect debate cards and wooden automata, and use them to cleverly "persuade" rebellious lords and bring peace to the land.

name: Space Nation Online
description: Start a universe voyage around the mysteriously splendid cluster of Telikos in Space Nation Online, the space opera MMORPG. Create your own tale and unveil the mysteries behind acute conficts among various factions and alien species.

name: Swift by Knight
description: Swift by Knight is a 2D platformer that puts you in control of Jack, the Nimble Knight, on a quest for speed and precision. Bounce off enemies, grapple, and utilize the unique level mechanics to navigate with speed and finesse.

name: Robot TD
description: Get ready to defend from murderous robots. Use your cast of towers to defend from the robots in this 3D strategy game.

name: The Mind's Decay
description: "The Mind's Decay" is a story-driven psychological horror game where Mark finds himself trapped in a cryptic, broken world.

name: Intergalactic Mystery
description: Embark on an epic adventure with Duke and Floc, fighting in alien worlds, unraveling cosmic secrets, and challenging bosses in search of the celestial origins of an enigmatic Alien. RPG, adventure, shooting, and NPC interaction. Get ready for intense action!

name: Racketeers
description: Form the most infamous criminal organization you can. Engage in numerous rackets, hire underlings, defend your turf, brew and mix contraband to distribute, run brothels, whack rival gangsters. Manage your criminal empire to earn millions. Become the most feared of the RACKETEERS!

name: RogueOut
description: RogueOut is a fresh take on Breakout with roguelike elements. Wield powerful balls, strategize against dynamic bricks, and explore unique mechanics in each playthrough. This strategic, arcade-style game redefines the classic, promising endless replayability and thrill.

name: Dart Racer
description: Dart Racer is an immersive VR arcade racing game set in a futuristic galaxy obsessed with speed. Master the intuitive controls, fine-tune your dart, and compete in thrilling races across a variety of strange environments.

name: Beach Vacation Simulator
description: Welcome to Beach Vacation Simulator, the cutting-edge simulator that offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility. Immerse yourself in a virtual paradise where your only priority is to take in the sights and sounds of the waves and wind brushing against the beach.

name: Dashgunner 0
description: Dashgunner is a single player FPS with stylized graphics and high mobility fast-paced gameplay. Player can grapple, slide, dash and traverse freely across various levels while engage in high-speed combat.

name: Kitchen Madness
description: Kitchen Madness is a frantic deck-building kitchen management game for the strategic solo player. As the head chef, you must assemble recipes, juggle ingredients, and manage unexpected events to whip up delicious dishes before the ticking clock sends your customers away hungry.

name: Edge Road
description: Edge-Road is an action game that tells the story of an ordinary student who becomes the most famous and popular person in his school. Help students, become a local vigilante, and experience a school life worthy of an 'Edgelord'.

name: Fallen Symphony
description: The world of Fallen Symphony is full of heated battles, engaging puzzles, and fearsome dungeons. Prepare yourself for a unique battle system which is inspired by brawlers from late 90s and gameplay based on the JRPGs of old.

name: Save My Human
description: This is the story about a little girl who is taken to an evil world inside a video game, and her dog embarks on an adventure to save her. The dog will not be alone, he will encounter other pets who are also searching for their owners.

name: Wanderer's Sigil
description: Wanderer’s Sigil is a turn-based roguelike RPG with a unique dice management system. Embrace the role of the courageous team of Wanderers in a realm scarred by mystical devastation. Manage your caravan, traverse the unknown, reclaim forgotten knowledge, and fight to survive!

name: Love Tavern 2: Beastmen Kingdoms
description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different staffs from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: The Suits Have Gone Mad!: The Upper Class
description: Experience the second chapter in the newest cult-hit episodic horror, The Suits Have Gone Mad!After stumbling across color, Theo Blue sets out to retrieve the presentation that caused the Suits to turn against him.

name: Dare to Desire: Season 1
description: A young man working a dead-end job decides he wants something greater out of life. He quickly finds himself chasing toward bigger and better things, through amazing discoveries and terrible heartbreak. Follow his journey to try and become rich, loved, respected and magnetic to women everywhere!

name: Monster Island
description: Become a Harem Master and breed a lot of cute and sexy monster girls on Monster Island!

name: Sweety Girls
description: Sweety Girls is an erotic visual novel in which you have to meet three enchanting beauties. Learn recipes for delicious desserts and choose the one you want to spend an evening alone with. Cook, seduce the girls and have fun!

name: BeadsPopper
description: BeadsPopper is a casual tile-matching puzzle game with a simple RPG element. Battle against adorable monster girls by popping colorful beads!

name: Yuying Mansion
description: A casual simulation game that allows players to live with beautiful women and play Tetris together, achieving points and receiving praise from the other party. Players can move to the character's area to chat or play a Tetris game. You can make a beautiful woman undress and reveal her body.

name: Lust's Cupid
description: Lust’s Cupid is a scene based simulation game where you can interact with characters and control their movements inside scenes. Customize your characters, choose a sex position you want to have them in and start blasting!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess Multiplayer
description: A multiplayer mod for local multiplayer The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess.

name: Explore the Backrooms
description: A backrooms game full of story puzzles, monsters and places to explore.

name: Summoned Hero
description: Survive waves of monsters, collect gold, upgrade your hero, unlock spells and fight for victory in an exciting action RPG game.

name: Gladiator Immortal
description: Gladiator Immortal is a turn-based fantasy Gladiator Rougelike game where you manage a team of Gladiators who fight for the glory of the gods. Build up your town, hire and level up gladiators, find powerful weapons and armour, learn and develop new skills and win favour with the gods.

name: Niktophobia
description: Niktophobia is a Sci-fi PC and VR horror for 1-4 players. The team arrives at the space station to extract alien bio-samples. Confronting an advanced alien AI, players will use various tools and manipulate the station's energy to get out of trouble together

name: After Light Fades
description: A mystical, magical puzzle game about letting go. After the loss of her beloved partner, Alice is left with seven emotionally resonant artefacts. She embarks on a journey to revisit seven of their favourite places and cast each artefact into an abyss, so she can finally be free

name: Go Banana
description: If you thought, "Wow, another weird game came out...", you're sharp! Feel like you're watching a B-movie, grab some cola and popcorn and get through this silly game! Get ready to throw your mind, time and money down the drain. And now you too, let's Go! Banana! to this crazy world!

name: Thrift Shop
description: Thrift Shop is a casual, thrift shopping simulation game. You start with an empty workshop and a full wallet of Thrift Coins. Your mentor, Papa Pinchpenny, teaches you how to navigate thrift stores, find unique items, resell for profit, and complete quests that unlock stores and skills.

name: Magic Inn
description: Reclaim glory in Magic Inn, a charming tavern life simulator. Take on the role of an exiled wizard-turned-innkeeper, overseeing everything from menus, rooms, guests, and staff in a fully magical customizable inn. Engage in card battles to spark conversations and foster relationships with guests.

name: Kobold Castle
description: Kobold Castle is a 2D arena survival game that takes place on the wall of a besieged castle. As one of 4 kobold defenders, you must hold the line against dangerous waves of attackers, collect upgrades and powerups, and defeat a variety of enemies and bosses. Try to survive as long as you can!

name: Plenty Karts
description: Make your way through over 20 tracks as you attempt to become the new champion of the Plenty Karts league. Mixing together the concept of classic kart racing games with side-scrollers, Plenty Karts is a nonstop action kart racer with 16 difficulty levels and a full story mode.

name: Crystal Void
description: Crystal Void takes a new twist on puzzle classics like Tetris and Pipe Dream with rogue-lite elements and retro sci-fi aesthetics. Race against the spreading crystal infection in numerous challenges or play in relaxed endless modes at your own pace.

name: Vanova's Stories
description: Vanova’s Stories is a goofy Point & Click game in which you take on the role of a unique detective on a quest to solve a crime in cooperation with your friends. Interact with suspects and collect clues that only you can obtain.

name: Sphere Shootout
description: "Blue Warrior 4" is a 2D cover tactical shooting game. The key to win in the game is not the shooting technique but the tactical walking.

name: Battlecore Robots
description: Customize your own mech: Use swords, bombs and all kind of weapons to defeat your oponents in frenetic battles with unique abilities! Play up to 4 players locally or online with Steam Remote Play. Enter the Battlecore arena!

name: Guncade
description: Guncade is a 1980's arcade lovers dream, if that dream also involves being an arms dealer to grannies, clowns, and other suspicious people. Journey through this visual novel and decide who to cater to and who can buzz off.

name: Ball King Jam
description: Join with friend or play solo against enemies in this silly physics-based take on basketball. Use trampolines, boosts or catch pigeons to help you win the game. Visit fun locations like pirate ship or stick to the cool street courts and show of your dunking skills!

name: Steam Panic
description: Award-winning steampunk puzzle game in which you spin the playfield to match the blocks in the box and solve Schrödinger's cat riddle.

name: Bungo Bash
description: Bungo Bash is a juicy, multiplayer, arena fighter where chunky animal champions known as Bungos, dash, bounce and bash each other off the arena until one remains.

name: Queen's Domain
description: Explore a mysterious island filled with secrets in this combat and traversal focused retro-inspired Action RPG.

name: With Them: Frontlines
description: Experience 'With Them: Frontlines', the pinnacle of military FPS games. Dive into intense multiplayer matches with unmatched realism, tactical 10v10 warfare, and dynamic combat scenarios. Unlock in-game emblems representing veteran charities. The battlefield awaits. Engage today!

name: Path of Soul
description: "The first story of the inevitable blood feud between the Demon Society and Earth God Entertainment!" - Become the protagonist of Earth God Entertainment and enjoy a 2D flying shooter game composed of differentiated patterns.

name: Dead Wolf
description: „Dead Wolf” is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive.

name: Dark Data: Zero
description: A toxic catalyst has spread throughout Lower-Detroit, plunging the metropolis into a mutant infested nightmare. Can you uncover the origin of this heinous act? Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.

name: SameShadow
description: SameShadow is a third-person ARPG that pits you against invading forces threatening your homeland. Unravel the mysteries behind this invasion as you “awaken” extraordinary powers of time, matter, and space within you through thrilling shooter-style or melee-focused combat.

name: Herdles
description: Herdles is a heartwarming puzzle platformer that can be customized to fit your preferred play style. Be theist herding dog and ensure the safety of your flock in this delightfully whimsical, interactive world. Find your way while being vigilant and staying one step ahead of pesky predators.

name: Medieval Darkness
description: Join your friends and embark on an epic adventure to stop the undead from covering the world in darkness. Craft your custom village and characters, explore ancient dungeons, and defend neighboring towns against the undead invasion. Can you survive the ultimate showdown versus evil?

name: Ruins and Refuge
description: Ruins and Refuge is a first person fantasy RPG dungeon crawler. Fight menacing beasts as you gather loot and rare materials. Select your class with weapon specialty and abilities. Gear up for your next adventure in up to 3 player co-op or face the danger ALONE!

name: Vinebound: Tangled Together
description: Vinebound: Bloom & Boom is a tasty mix of horde-survival roguelite and chaotic couch co-op for 1-2 players. Coordinate your position, synchronize attacks, and defeat hordes of moldy foes while unlocking new arsenals to cultivate plantastic builds.

name: Phantom Wardrobe
description: Explore a mysterious land infested with ghosts and creatures to find out the truth about your past. Collect hats with unique powers that can help you overcome challenges and change the way you play. There are many to secrets to uncover and evil creatures to defeat.

name: Red Genie: An Eidola Tale
description: Red Genie is a turn-based adventure RPG with a focus on weapon and magic variety, with the ability to swap between any one of ten equipped Weapons. This challenging game has a fantastical aesthetic and a rich soundtrack with a story found through player exploration!

name: Charged!
description: Make over the top RC-Car commericials of the 90's a reality, in electrifying, movement intensive team based battles from a miniature perspective. Control modified RC-Cars, Helicopters and Aircraft, each equipped with unique DIY-weaponary and -gadgets, in highly immersive, detailed environments.

name: Lucy's Journey
description: Lucy's Journey is a visual novel where every decision counts. Discover the rich and complex world of Maana, where humans, divinities, titans, demons, and elves struggle for their destiny. Your journey begins now.

name: Homeless Guy
description: An out-of-place man wanders into a town with nothing but a photograph. Get employed, invest, join gangs, commit crime, and rise above in this cynical comedy.

name: Pippin's Mysterious Garden
description: Explore the whimsical world of Pippin in this short, 2D adventure and exploration game. Traverse a wild garden, uncover secrets, discover treasures, and meet adorable NPCs in this enchanting storybook world.

name: Heartrender
description: Welcome to the Null, a surrealist non-space between worlds, times and concepts, populated by outcasts and detritus from across existence. As a lone, self-serving agent of mayhem on a personal mission, sneak, brawl, shoot and swing your way through immersive, open-ended heists.

name: Cursed Realm
description: In Cursed Realm, you play as an adventurer in search of mystical rune stones to lift a realm's curse. Your main task involves traveling, gathering clues, and winning the trust of NPCs. A journey full of challenges and uncertainties awaits. Are you ready?

name: Starlab
description: Gather resources, travel between worlds, construct bases and manage power to construct your Starlab. Research lost technology to survive the hostile environments of humanities long abandoned sun.

name: Pulse of Love
description: "Pulse of Love" is a captivating visual novel set in the vibrant world of the Korean K-pop scene drama. Experience the exhilarating journey of love, passion, and self-discovery as you navigate the highs and lows of fame.

name: Hack/ed
description: Join the famous game streamer PinkyPie as her world turns upside down with a mysterious message during what seemed to be a regular streaming night. Can you help her unravel the identity of the blackmailer and break free? Every choice counts. Shape your own storyline in this interactive FMV.

name: Collapsing
description:
Game1: Tap these colored blocks and at least 2 blocks of the same color are tied together. These same blocks will be eliminated.The more blocks you eliminate at one time, the higher the score you get
Game2: The blocks will increase from the bottom and lightly remove them. Don't let the block pile exceed the red line.
Game3: Each block has a number, the sum of the selected block numbers is equal to the sum of the upper left corner, then these blocks will be eliminated
Game4: Two-player game, the eliminated blocks will be added to the bottom of the block stack. Whoever surpasses the red line first fails

name: Kasplat
description:
Choose your dart, lock'n'load your color palette and rain colorful chaos in this brilliant bonanza of messy mayhem.
Fight for the high-score with multiple game modes, epic powerups and deeper strategy than meets the eye in Kasplat.

name: Fire and Brim Co.
description: Embark on an epic adventure in this top-down action RPG! Take on the role of Ned, a disgruntled demon employee seeking to restore Hell's former glory. Confront your resistant manager, battle the 7 Sins and Satan, and make Hell great again in this thrilling demon-filled quest!

name: Bleak Frontier
description: Bleak Frontier is a strategy / city builder game set in a frozen wasteland in the far future, 4087 AD. As the chosen leader of the first permanent settlement in almost a century, you must guide the last survivors of the human race towards an uncertain future. Welcome to the Bleak Frontier.

name: UVSU
description: Outsmart yourself, iteration by iteration. You alternate between playing as the hero and the enemies. There's no AI in this game- It's replaying what you did previous iterations.

name: Zero Degrees
description: This is a Third-person shooting indie game. Players will kill zombies, loot, complete quests, level up, and unlock new areas and AI teammates in a semi open map. The game includes day-night system, custom dressing, loot lost on death, and simple hivemind AI.

name: Carlos Klauss: Episode Zero
description: Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ is a Graphic Adventure with Visual Novel elements which introduces you to the life and history of Carlos Klauss and his misadventures.

name: Only Ban!
description: You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!

name: Deru
description: This game is a Fantasy turn-based adventure game.

name: Formation
description: Join the elite ranks of the 7th Flight Demonstration Squadron AKA the 'Bullsharks'. In wartime, the '7th' invoked fear in the hearts of the enemy. In peacetime, they thrill the citizens of the floating city of Ocea with daring formation routines. Hold your nerve and stay in formation!

name: Realms and Ruins: Abencor
description: Realms & Ruins: Abencor is a first-person, grid-based, open world, retro, pixel art dungeon crawler harkening back to the days of yore. Realms & Ruins takes inspiration from games like Wizardry and Might & Magic and other cRPG's of the 90's.

name: Infernal Apocalypse: Rise of the Underworld
description: The first online RTS game based in Hell. As a low-rank demon, you and your friends build your own kingdom, manage slaves and resources, fight hordes of demons, and rise up the ranks until you meet Satan himself. After all, our eternal damnation is certain, so why not practice beforehand?

name: Sundown Survival
description: "Sundown Survival" is a heart-pounding top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Navigate an intense day-night cycle by crafting gear and fortifications during the day to fend off zombies at night. Survival meets Action-RPG: every decision, every upgrade matters. Can you make it till dawn?

name: Elemental Fury
description: Elemental Fury is a 4 player co-op action game inspired by the mythical setting of the ancient far east. Battle the waves after waves of legendary enemies with your friends for survival and treasures in online and hot-seat multiplayer.

name: Where I Belong
description: How hard is becoming friends with others? Explore the challenging dynamics of high school relationships in "Where I Belong," a compelling visual novel that delves into the complexities of friendship, toxicity, and the search for one's place in a crowded world.

name: Iron Naval Battle
description: A sea of conflict, never back down. During the battle, you can switch any warship of your own side arbitrarily, a fast-paced naval battle game simulator. Let the shells roar, I am invincible.

name: Folktale Misfits
description: Folktale Misfits the card game roguelike where you play as outcasts looking for answers in a whimsical world. Develop strategies and help the misfit heroes unlock their true potential.

name: Away From Home
description: A Rhythm based RPG experience. Providing detailed pixel art and expressive animation. Experience a fun world with lots of colorful characters. Come and disrupt their peace!

name: Kejora
description: Kejora is a hand-drawn animated puzzle platformer adventure, tells the story of a girl named Kejora pursued by monstrous creatures after discovering a dreadful secret. She is accompanied by her friends who can assist her in overcoming obstacles and find the truth behind their peaceful village life.

name: Triple Treble Triumph
description: How many genres have you mastered? Is it enough to play 3 of them simultaneously? Triple Treble Triumph puts 27 games into 1. Accept its trial to prove how much of a Gamer you are.

name: Sealed Gate
description: Sealed Gate is a medieval fantasy RPG where you explore a huge world, meet different characters, fight monsters and choose your path.

name: Astroventure: Unchartred Planet
description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Sophia, a brave heroine searching for her lost friend Olga. Explore uncharted worlds, encounter diverse races, and unravel cosmic mysteries. Will you find Olga amidst the depths of space? Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock new realms in this captivating adventure

name: Freedom is Piracy
description: Or, a young archeologist, leaves the continent to find the legendary pirate city: Alticia. This city exists and gathers pirates from the 4 corners of the world who are thirsty of freedom! Play solo or 4 players coop to evolve in a world as opened as rich as surprising. And watch out for the Marine!

name: Lucky Shield
description: Lucky Shield - a medieval beat 'em up in which the player is a living shield that absorb magic orbs to power up its attacks and recapture the continent from invaders and traitors.

name: Lichbound
description: As the controlling influence of the Lich spreads across the Spirit Realm, a lone spirit's fury is ignited. Confront the shadowy Beasts and absorb their power as you fight your way through the Lich's domain to put an end to his tyranny.

name: Bite Size Terrors: GuyGuy Toys
description: Welcome to GUYGUY Toys! As the new Employee, I hope you..you..you.. Learn How to Deliver Toys Happily!

name: God Brawl
description: Take control of a fledgling religion and strike down the false gods of your enemies. God Brawl is a revival of the classic god game genre. The people need something to believe in, why shouldn't it be you?

name: FrostPanic: Whispers of Sertão
description: FrostPanic: Whispers of Sertão is a suspenseful boomershoot set in a supernatural snowy sertão. Navigate through eerie environments, uncover secrets, and survive against otherworldly threats in a visually striking world inspired by Northeastern Brazil’s woodcut art.

name: Illusion Within
description: Gabriel - A psychedelic horror detective game in which you have to stage Ragnarok to get your beloved back. Travel through the worlds of Scandinavia, destroying the giants of Jotun to fulfill your part of the deal promised to Loki, the god of perfidy. You will have to decide who to trust.

name: Merged Gravity
description: Merged Gravity is a fun and challenging gravity based 2d platformer game where you control a ball on it's way to fix the core of the Space Station.

name: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime
description: Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and way too many frogs.

name: Castaway Coalition
description: Castaway Coalition is an immersive survival game set on a remote island. Struggle for survival, build a community, satisfy human needs, and navigate a world affected by a dynamic day-night cycle. Craft tools, erect shelters, and farm to outlive island life. Your survival story awaits!

name: Silicon Zephyr
description: Silicon Zephyr is a swarm-building adventure set in a land reclaimed by sand.

name: Strange Shadow
description: This is a thrill adventure game where you run and hide from scary giant creatures.

name: American Christmas 2
description: Inspired by the nostalgic and magical feeling of Christmas as a kid, you'll feel immersed in a fantasy world reminiscent of those classic 2-D platformers you loved to play growing up.

name: Spell Legion
description: A RTS/action RPG strategy game with the combination of a Top-down/Third person view, letting you to Command your Army with orders and increase it using buildings along all factions in a Unique Fantasy World.

name: Wraithborn
