description: Take a step and distance yourself from reality! Wraithborn is a unique action game offering a breathtaking VR experience in a magical world. You will find yourself inside a grand dungeon and embark on an adrenaline-filled adventure as you explore rooms, each with a different concept.

name: Crystalis Descendant
description: Battle hordes of monsters and destroy their burrows in Crystalis Descendant - a fast-paced rogue-lite game. Create overpowering builds using a diverse cast of characters, weapons and abilities while you choose how to dominate the arena.

name: Fruitalistic!
description: Fruitland is in peril! Use your launchers and trusty fruit squad to repel the sugary invaders, and bring peace once again.

name: Orblike Madness
description: Wake up abandoned child, for your target has finally shown its face. Orblike Madness is an ARPG/Twin-Stick Shooter where you must enter the palace that holds the gate to heaven and dwelve into the depths of its dungeon to find the blood-drinking beast that invaded it.

name: Foviki Empieria
description: Race against a relentless monster in this heart-pounding multiplayer horror. Play as one of four survivors trapped in an asylum, working together to solve puzzles and search for keys. You can't fight back - only escape. Will you outwit the monster and find freedom, or succumb to the darkness?

name: Desert Dungeons
description: As the newest recruit to the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild, you'll have to gear up, explore the Holokai desert, and delve into the dungeons located there to become the best Adventurer!

name: CyberStrike Chronicles
description: Cyberpunk multiplayer madness: Fast-paced battles, cooperative, four fierce characters, and a neon-lit cityscape.

name: Solar System Experience
description: An educational, family-friendly game about our very own Solar System. Fly through space, land on planets and learn all the essential information about planets. You can take quizzes about each planet to check your knowledge.

name: Backswamp
description: Survive the flood aftermath alone. Secure food and water, use debris for survival, Explore the reef when tides recede, find resources,and mind your backpack and seawater conditions. Craft tools, avoid creatures, and advance technology to escape. You are your only hope.

name: Under the Snow
description: Alex and her father live in a post-apocalyptic world where most of humanity has perished. The world has become a cold, snow-covered place where people communicate with each other at a distance using ground antennas, which frequently malfunction.

name: Kill the God
description: A action filled pixel art first person hack n' slash with many bosses, items and story points. Play as the fallen god of speed to reclaim what you had wrongfully revoked.

name: Hack n' Stack
description: Repair buildings and fight off opponents in this chaotic party game for 2 to 4 players. Build a brighter tomorrow for the kingdom as a team or face off in action-packed building contests where blocks and players fly all over the screen.

name: Grotesque Insight
description: Grotesque Insight is a narrative-driven point-and-click puzzle game set in the harsh desert of western North America in 1933. In this game, you will encounter a unique and enigmatic bounty hunter known as the Grotesque Hunter. you will uncover the secrets of both this world and yourselves.

name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
description: A 6-color pixel horror adventure game set in an abandoned space station. But you're not alone up here. And air's running out.

name: Echo of Migration
description: You will live on a new planet and strive to develop your own land. In this technologically degraded world, you need to survive by planting crops, fishing, exploring, and other means. Unlock the secrets of your background and become an adventurer.

name: Shroom Keeper
description: Shroom Keeper is a mushroom farming simulator and a puzzle game that encourages experimentation. So grab your flasks and gardening tools - there is science to conduct and magic to be made. Discover the might in the mycelium!

name: The Great Sassanelli
description: As war breaks out all around you on a scale never seen before, you, ringmaster dilettante, must keep the circus afloat. Travel, entertain, and keep the troupe’s spirits up on your way to find a mythical safe haven to last out the storm in this beautifully illustrated, text-based narrative adventure.

name: FairyWoods Patisserie
description: Create and operate an exquisite Patisserie in the fascinating forest of the FairyWoods.

name: Rotate: Collective
description: Walk on walls and solve physics puzzles as you explore a massive underground facility. Uncover its dark secrets and try to escape with your life.

name: Castlemancer
description: How long can you last in this survival roguelite deckbuilder? Play cards to manage castle resources, defeat invaders, and damage the enemy army. Make difficult choices, cast powerful spells, and weather the siege!

name: Soulker Defense
description: Hyperscaling, fusions, strategies, synergies and more. A gothic style casual game with a tactic gameplay progressing to an ultimate battle of thousands of monsters.

name: The Rift Between Us
description: In this action-platformer, Jordan must use his Lunar Powers to traverse an apocalyptic world to find his love, Ember. Knowing not what fate has befallen her, Jordan will traverse any number of miles and confront any monstrosity the looming rift throws his way...

name: Inventorix
description: Inventorix, your trusty high-tech space asset inventory device, holds the key to extracting value from the vast resources scattered across the cosmos. But this marvel of technology comes at a price—quite literally. You secured it through a questionable loan scheme, and now you're on the hook to pay off your ever-increasing debt before the space loan sharks come knocking.

name: Germline
description: Germline invites you to a post-apocalyptic world. In this new world, humanity is facing complete extinction. Now stand up, put on your armor and weapons. Fight to avoid danger, because you are humanity's last hope.

name: Varista
description: A VR Barista Simulation Game, fast paced arcade job simulator with an emphasis on fun interaction and customer satisfaction!

name: Repeat After Me
description: Repeat After Me, the multiplayer game for single players! Make this work, by utilizing your unique ability of cloning yourself at any time and record any action you can think of. Your clones will forever repeat your every step - or misstep. Can you work with yourself?

name: Edge of Oblivion
description: Edge of Oblivion is a turn-based action roguelike. Face off against an ever growing horde as you battle towards the final boss. Create dynamic (and frankly absurd) builds to cleave through your foes. Think a few steps ahead and perfectly utilize your items to master the battlefield.

name: Offscreen
description: Escape from a flat 2D TV screen and discover a 3D world in this story-driven puzzle game! Embark on a journey between dimensions, walk across the neon city, through the screens full of unexpected puzzles.

name: Dance Dash
description: Dance Dash is a thrilling VR rhythm game where you move your full body to the beat and become one with your avatar. Bring the arcade home and feel the music as you nail sick combos with independently tracked feet movements.

name: Chromatic Shift
description: Destroy thousands of unearthly creatures and machines, and progress through the strange world you find yourself in. Chromatic Shift is a small rogue-lite game where you mix and match powerful colors to create your perfect build of abilities. Find your favorite combinations and become powerful!

name: RhythmMMO
description: This extraordinary blend of massively multiplayer gameplay combines the endless freedom and creativity of sandbox worlds with the delightful tempo-driven mechanics of rhythm games.

name: Dark Watcher
description: Embark on a pixelated journey of exploration, platforming, and intense battles in Dark Watcher. Unveil the secrets of a dark realm, unlock abilities, and confront formidable adversaries.

name: Starveil
description: Hack, slash, shoot and loot your way through a diverse array of shattered worlds in this sci-fi fantasy co-op MORPG. Starveil is a cyclical game in which player progress resets and the whole world regenerates and reconfigures itself to provide a fresh experience every season.

name: Destination Unknown
description: Destination Unknown is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space galaxies, RPG elements, mini-games, mining, and crafting. Experience an adventure through a randomly generated universe filled with an exciting sci-fi story full of secrets, quests, and more.

name: Scrapchasers
description: A rogue-lite dice game in space! Build your ship as you explore randomly generated star systems, survive hostile encounters, and upgrade your colony ship for the next generation of chasers. Can you find a new home for your orphaned race amongst the stars?

name: Reapers Inc.
description: Reapers Inc., is a fast-paced RTS where you lead an elite squad to defend your base against relentless intergalactic threats. Navigate diverse planetary biomes, strategically manage your squad, and use quick decision-making skills to exterminate your foes. Stand your ground, and reap the rewards.

name: Boreas
description: You've been wandering the seas for years. It's time to think about the future. Trade, improve your settlements, build relationships with the locals. Build your own safe haven!

name: Quantum Knights
description: As an open-world TPS RPG, ‘Quantum Knights’ offers a variety of unique charismatic characters and guns for you to combine and create your own playstyle.Become a Volant and explore the vast world while enjoying a true farming and growth experience!

name: Apocalypse Lords
description: The Apocalypse Begins! Select a supernatural being and plunge the world into chaos. Engage in epic battles against countless enemies, infecting and transforming them into servants while empowering your creature with diverse skills. Ascend to become the best apocalypse lord on the universe!

name: Sin & Host: The Diner
description: Sin & Host: The Diner is a classic survival horror with fixed cameras and pre-rendered backgrounds. Take control of Hanako and her younger sister, Aiko, as they navigate the early days of a zombie outbreak in a desperate search for their missing parents.

name: 9 Realms
description: Embark on an epic journey through the 9 Realms! Immerse yourself in a 3D Multiplayer Viking Fantasy, combining Dungeon Crawling and first-person melee extraction. Customize your hero, raid treacherous dungeons, and pillage the loot off your fallen enemies.

name: Trans Theft Horso
description: A colourful western fantasy adventure, to save trans joy! Adric Belfonte embarks on a happy nightmare into the wild and bewaffling West. Explore the maddening desert, defy the admirals, ride the animals, fight the haters, and save the missing hormones! A feverish wild-west fantasy, in full colour!

name: Pizza Bandit
description: Pizza Bandit is a mission-based 1-4 player co-op shooter. As a time-traveling bounty hunter, venture across various eras and realms on dangerous missions. It has Gears-like combat minus the cover with snappy controls and dodge-rolling with close to mid-range combat.

name: Spectral Keep
description: Descend into the haunting depths of Spectral Keep an atmospheric horror adventure. Uncover dark secrets, solve puzzles, and confront malevolent specters using your spectral sight in a cursed castle. Immerse yourself in suspenseful gameplay as you navigate eerie halls and unravel the mysteries within

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: World
description: XCOM meets Football Manager. Embark on the career of an unknown coach: tactically outsmart opponents in turn-based matches, earn money and experience, search for talented players, manage a club, build your reputation to get invited to lead the national team, and win the World Championship!

name: Last Emperor
description: Lead a waning Empire back to its former glory in this fictional Cold War text-based RPG. As emperor, choose who to trust and who to silence. Adapt to changing times or cling to tradition. Enact reforms to revive the economy, enforce law and order, and reinforce the Empire’s place under the Sun.

name: Blackfall
description: Blackfall is a roguelite movement shooter game with combat and loot elements where the main objective is to deactivate all digging stations, exit the dream loop and rescue your friends.

name: Dead Petals Bliss
description: A fractal-trance bullet-trip from the creators of Dead Petals and satryn.

name: Z Ops: Campus
description: Z Ops: Campus is a 3rd person action and survival game. Unfortunately one day a zombie apocalypse hit the world. Between his needs and the threats, the player will have to think carefully to choose priorities and manage the fights So hope to live the longest.

name: Tunnel Boat Terror
description: Drive terrifyingly fast and iconic power boats each with unique; design, destruction, customizations, tuning, turning, throttling, and trim. Improve your skill and equipment in your pursuit of becoming a power boat racing legend. A brand-new racing experience for enthusiasts and newcomers alike.

name: Hello, Vic
description: Ellie, your new girlfriend, doesn't seem to get along well with your circle of friends. Find out what is going wrong after one of your best friends suddenly doesn't answer his phone anymore in this pixel-art, story-driven adventure.

name: Sylvantia
description: Sylvantia is a mysterious creature collector. You find yourself lost in a giant forest controlled by ancient gods. Will you be able to make it out of the forest with the help of the there residing Antia´s?

name: Quarantine-Z
description: 2 years have passed since a virus totally unknown to humanity originated in your small town. People have become aggressive and cannibalistic.

name: Eldritch Town
description: Eldritch Town is a roguelite city building game with tower defense elements. Build your town, collect and manage resources, rebuild and strengthen the walls to defeat hordes of lovecraftian horrors that attack your town from the outside and cultists that disrupt it from the inside.

name: Ligo
description: Ligo is an exploration Sokoban game, where you solve handcrafted puzzles and mysteries about the world by merging, cutting, pushing small creature together and crushing squids with block. Each part of the world has different rules and challenges.

name: Cybersonic Strike
description: Cybersonic Strike is a fast-paced, top-down shooter roguelite set in a worldwide cybersystem under siege by hordes of AI invaders. Craft uniquely powerful builds and recruit charming party members from across the globe to help you hack deeper into the system and cleanse the corruption.

name: Exorcizamuste
description: Exorcizamuste is an Action, Horror, Survival, Puzzle Solving and Investigation game for single or multiplayer with its online cooperative mode.

name: Forgotten Waters
description: Forgotten Waters is a single-player farming and resource management game. Farm, explore, and befriend underwater citizens. Manage resources, engage in combat, and protect your underwater town from hostile sea creatures and lurking enemies.

name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café
description: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxed decoration and rhythm game where you manage a cafeteria and befriend cute animals.

name: Arie: Moonprayer
description: "Arie: Moonprayer" is a storytelling exploration game. Moon is falling, and the world is ending. Diallo, a man who can sense the memories of the gone, has one last mission on earth: Go up to the peak nearest to the moon with his mentor's daughter, find out the truth of this world.

name: Dvalloc
description: Explore a vast, underground world filled with secrets, intense fights and challenging platforming. Defeat cursed rune's corruption and help a dwarven village return to its former self, all while admiring stunning pixelart visuals. Are you ready to become Dvalloc the dwarf?

name: Blade of Tsunami
description: Your father is dead, his life cut-short by a ruthless corporation. Take up the blade and enact vengeance in a visceral, fast-paced, isometric slasher that blends cyberpunk with a visual style heavily influenced by traditional Japanese aesthetics.

name: Trials of Imorah
description: Venture through the depths of a ruined realm. Battle demonic creatures, uncover powerful artifacts, and solve devious puzzles all to prove yourself worthy in this grand challenge for immortality.

name: Lord O' Pirates
description: Lord O' Pirates is a difficult yet casual bullet heaven roguelite which puts you at the helm of your very own pirate ship. Engage in naval combat against hordes of military ships, sea monsters, supernatural entities, and [REDACTED]. Loot gold and use it to unlock new ships, captains, and upgrades!

name: TerraForge
description: You must manage your mining operation, collect resources, and craft items to sell for profit. Upgrade your mining tools, unlock mysterious blueprints, discover powerful relics, and as you progress towards your goal, travel farther lands, purchase better mining licences and go deeper and deeper.

name: Momogatari
description: Explore the Yomi world with a sacred weapon that can change sword types. Fight different "Yokai" and challenge the "Kami" of this world.

name: CyberNet Duel
description: Become a Legend! Here is a deck-building game in the cyberpunk genre. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of corporations and gangs, implants and cyberpsychosis. Fight in quick card duels where strategy and luck are equally important.

name: Scoops & Social Ice-Olation
description: Scoops & Social Ice-Olation is a visual novel and minigame collection crossover about recovering from a pandemic, ice cream, and penguins.

name: The Continuum
description: Delve into 'The Continuum', a stealth-action platformer intertwined with resource management, set in an interstellar war. You will utilize high -tech alien gadgets, and strategic planning to rescue allies, disrupt an almighty enemy Hivemind, and manage your resources as you navigate the cosmos.

name: Mary Help Me!
description: Mary Help Me! is a platformer game in a Japanese environment, including die and retry mechanics. Take on the role of Adam in an adventure full of twists and turns. Fight alongside Mary, who will help you in your quest.

name: Versus
description: A sci-fi 2.5D and 3rd Person Action Shooter.

name: Wolf Simulator
description: Attention, nature lovers! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary adventure as you step into the paws of a magnificent wolf in the untamed wilderness. In this immersive Wolf RPG Simulator game, it's time to unleash your primal instincts and conquer the challenges of survival!

name: TerranLands
description: TerranLands is a survival adventure game. Explore and gather resources in many different caves, build and craft new items in your home, and discover old Terran stories.

name: You Will Not Survive
description: Awaken Lost Pilgrim, and fight through the Forsaken Lands, where there is only one constant...We Are All Going To Die. Discover the dark truth of the world you have been thrust into as you battle your way through this bullet hell.

name: Marwan's Haunting
description: Uncover the dark secrets of Shoreside College in Marwan's Haunting. Explore the ruins, face the wrath of the mascot, and solve chilling puzzles to unravel a haunting mystery. Can you survive the nightmare and uncover the truth?

name: The Manor
description: A Co-op 1-4 player horror survival which will have you searching for clues, items, aiming to solve the mystery of The Manor and running for your life... Discover what happened to the previous residents and escape whilst you can..

name: Run Fire
description: Nothing but shoot every thing.The only thing to worry about is not having enough bullets.

name: Blazing Dragon
description: Welcome to Blazing Dragon! An action roguelite where you'll face devastating hordes of enemies while upgrading your character, making your character more and more powerful. Choose your character and enjoy the journey through this magical and dangerous world!

name: Transmuters
description: Experience a deck-building game with a roguelike twist! Battle hordes of monsters to escape from a terrible fate. Transmute skills to gain new techniques and synergize awesome combos to win the day!

name: Laser Survivor
description: Laser Survivor is a top-down rogue-lite shooter where you play as an astronaut stranded on a space station, you can choose one primary weapon, one jetpack which has slots for weapons and modifiers, and indeed your laser turrets which will help you during the run. Build your way to survive.

name: OdiChat
description: Connect to a cozy chat platform created by Odi, an AI individual, make new wholesome friends and have some tea talking about life, hobbies, interests and relationships.

name: De'Vot
description: De'Vot is a 2D platformer puzzle game set in a dark and treacherous world. Survive deadly encounters as everything outside your home seeks your demise, with humanity long gone.

name: Tales of Spark: Probation
description: Dear players, step into the world of "Tales of Spark: Probation" as a young swordsman! This is a game with real-time combat, abundant treasures, rich storyline, and diverse character builds. Of course, the challenges are also immense. Wishing you good luck on your journey!

name: Cloak Hero
description: Cloak Hero is a rougelite dungeon crawler. Monsters and demons, swords and magic, skills and powers. A hero must rise to face challenges and fight through dungeons to save the kingdom and restore peace.

name: Clean-up Squad
description: Assemble your friends in a squad in this satisfying and challenging cleaning game. Get paid by cleaning different types of properties by removing trash, mopping stains and doing other cleaning tasks. Upgrade your gear to be able to take on bigger projects to become the best squad out there.

name: My Earth
description: My Earth is a 3D Sokoban game. In an environment where glaciers are melting due to global warming, the main character, a baby penguin, is separated from the group. The baby penguins find their way back to the colony.

name: Downfall Hearts
description: Imprisoned in a mysterious, ever rearranging dungeon, you fight for your survival. Will you find a way to free yourself and the remaining knights of the Downfall Hearts Order?

name: Insurgency Runner
description: Insurgency Runner - 3D runner with shooter elements in which you play as a soldier running along the road, jumping over different obstacles, collecting ammo and other bonuses, and killing rebels,. Don't get into their sightlines or you will be shot.

name: Eighteen Gold
description: Enlist in law enforcement or misfortune, take the intensity of combat to a new level and control of the situation in your hands, with the magnificent shooting simulator with 85% realism, Eighteen Gold...

name: Haunted House
description: "Haunted House" is a VR-only horror game set in Japan. It will be the content of escaping from a Japanese mansion where various ghosts such as samurai and ninja are wandering. We are currently working on it!

name: Him
description: Him is the superhero the world needs. A third person fighting game that puts you up close and personal with the enemy. Him is both fun and addicting to play.

name: PoligonVR
description: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

name: Asbury Pines
description: A grisly murder in a small town unfolds across centuries. Incremental-style interactions with the people, places, and events of Asbury Pines grow resources and build rewarding production engines that unlock a sprawling mystery embedded in the flow of time.

name: Sixty Jumps to Ceres
description: In this strategy-roguelike game, you command a space ship on a desperate last mission in the asteroid belt. Negotiate, battle your foes, and upgrade your ship. Get stronger as you progress into increasingly hostile space. Only the boldest, most skilled captain will make it to Ceres. Will you?

name: Rival Party
description: Rival Party is a multiplayer fast-paced party game packed with unique and challenging mini-games that will give you endless hours of fun and excitement!

name: Oudbiao's World
description: Everyone watches Oudbiao, everyone talks about Oudbiao, everyone is Oudbiao, in fact, each of us has been trying to realize our wishes in our own way in this world, and the result may not be the same. As much as you want, but I still hope that everyone's tomorrow will be better

name: Backrooms Exploration Liminal
description: Dive into a retro liminal space, adventure. Explore the enigmatic Backrooms, freely navigate eerie corridors, and unveil secrets of this liminal realm through immersive storytelling. Experience haunting gameplay with atmospheric audio, and captivating scenery!

name: The Nightmare Escape
description: Navigate through your nightmares in this immersive first-person horror game. Explore a mysterious abandoned apartment building and unlock four unique interconnected short stories and piece together the puzzles to escape your nightmare.

name: Dysplaced
description: After falling from the sky into a realm of myth and magic, you'll start a new life in a stunning, yet imperiled domain: Gather resources, build, cook, fish. Learn magic, smithing, hunting, alchemy, and more. Is there a way back? But know this: There's a dark force rising - and you must prepare ⚔️

name: Fania
description: Join Fania, a hungry panda, on an adorable whimsical journey through different places, solving puzzles, and meeting quirky characters. Help Fania collect ingredients, overcome challenges, and discover the ultimate recipe, all while spreading joy and smiles in this delightful adventure.

name: LifeDev
description: 1st Person 3D Exploration Point&Click Intimate Journey. Based on real-life events. Experience trauma, gather clues, join the dots, find allies, unravel the truth, create your way out, face the demons, become stronger, challenge your "reality". Have you had enough already?

name: Sudoku Puzzle
description: Sudoku is a popular digital logic game, and this Sudoku Puzzle will be one of the few good sudoku games on steam.

name: Deck of Bullets
description: Unleash explosive action in a deck-building top-down shooter. Customize your bullets with a strategic deck of cards for devastating effects.

name: Ruins of the Lost
description: Ruins of the Lost is an action roguelike game set in the remnants of an ancient civilization. You'll face off against a variety of evil minions while exploring the mysterious environment. Discover and use unique bows to adapt your combat style as you confront increasingly challenging enemies.

name: Opposyte
description: Have you ever imagined a race between teams starting from the same point, but with OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS? The encounter is inevitable. Survive your enemies, complete laps and score points for your team or strive to disrupt your opponents race. Choose the best strategy for your team.

name: Dante's Cowboy
description: A Neo-Western town is simmering with conflict: mysterious forces fight for power, and you're the lynchpin that can save or destroy it. With a novel dynamic text system, you can say and do anything to the NPCs, then they generate personalized actions and speech in response.

name: Florarium
description: Florarium is a Metroidvania game focused on exploration and battle. Explore the mysterious world full of unexpected secrets. Battle fierce enemies with your bow. Choose your own path to your goddess in the vast, interconnected world.

name: Shadow of Mammon
description: Explore a vibrant and beautiful world intertwined with dangers from an ancient war. Shadow of Mammon is a fast paced Action RPG inspired by modern jrpgs.

name: To Last
description: It is an action and horror game set in the 1980s. Our main character, Walter Winson, takes on his latest job, showcasing his prominent detective skills. Walter Winson's life has been dedicated to investigating mysterious events, and he is now seeking more challenging cases.

name: Highway Patrol Simulator
description: Patrol the highways, conduct traffic stops, and surprise criminals. Collaborate with your police dog and negotiate on the edge of the law to build the career you've always dreamt of in highway patrol. From a simple law enforcement officer to the head of traffic police, now you are in control.

name: Air Offense Command
description: Side scrolling shooter in which you lead a desperate preemptive strike to save your homeland from annihilation.

name: Liona's Adventure
description: Once in a peaceful village , there lived a brave little warrior named Liona,One fateful night, the village was attacked by a horde of monstrous creatures. Liona's parents died in battle. Liona, witnessing the loss of her parents, felt a fire ignite within her heart—a burning desire for vengeance.

name: Goblins Never Die
description: Goblins Never Die is a roguelite horde-battler with simple controls inspired by Vampire Survivors and Pikmin. Enter the combat ritual of Gobogongo. Strengthen your clan. Fuel the bonfire with the skulls of your foes (or friends)! Earn the favor of the shadowy god, ZOOG.

name: We Are Gladiators
description: We Are Gladiators is a challenging turn-based RPG roguelite game about commanding and managing a company of gladiators. Recruit, train and lead a roster of characters from all walks of life against ruthless outlaws, wild beasts, savage greenskins and undead monstrosities!

name: Stay Alive
description: Narrative-driven, third-person survival horror game where you fight through the zombie infested city of Paradise. Solve puzzles, collection items and manage your inventory while to survive. Play through two full storylines of two protagonist each with unique styles of gameplay and obstacles.

name: Protoshock
description: Protoshock is a multiplayer first-person shooter that combines the fast-paced action with advanced movement; Players take on the role of creatures known as protogens, and battle their way through a variety of maps and game modes to rip apart their enemies.

name: GalRock Girls
description: Play as a cute yet violent warrior as you traverse new worlds trying grow your social circle while taking out the masses of dangerous enemies.

name: Take the Earth
description: Escape captivity, then through the blood gold gained in battle and legends found hidden in the world customise your character and your army to conquer the World

name: Bombard
description: Bombard is a Block-Breaking Action game with Elemental Balls and Blocks.

name: Ball-istic
description: The goal is simple, get fast. Every level can be completed in thousands of different ways, but only 1 is the fastest. Your first try might be slow, but by your 10th try you'll be flying through the level at insane speeds. The more levels you complete the easier finding the fastest paths will become.

name: Tombstone Taxi
description: In this hectic couch co-op, bullet hell, roguelike where you flamethrow zombies and rocket launch bandits, you and your crew must taxi passengers to safety through the dangerous radioactive wasteland to the safe haven city of Spirowood… but for a fee! Use money earned to upgrade weapons and more!

name: Planetary Life
description: Manipulate climate, add plants and evolve creatures in this planet and life sandbox simulation game. From cells to civilisations, spread life throughout the whole planet. Or just enjoy watching your creation burn!

name: Dwarf Hall
description: Your home destroyed, your clan scattered! Avenge the fallen and build a new Dwarf Hall. Adventure to gather resources and rescue dwarves. Restore the essentials - forge, fermenter and more - to improve your heroes. Action roguelite horde slaughter combined with settlement builder.

name: Scientific Project: Optic
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of 'Scientific project: Optic'! This immersive first-person puzzle game invites you on a journey through the realm of optical science, from its philosophical origins to modern understanding.

name: WastePunk
description: WastePunk: A Post Nuclear Action Game. An action fueled roguelike shooter in a post apocalyptic wasteland.

name: The Shifting Cavern
description: Explore a procedurally-generated subterranean world in The Shifting Cavern! Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and help fellow adventurers as you journey to the bottom of the ever-changing Cavern and unravel its mysteries.

name: Pho King My Life
description: Pho King My Life is a story-driven adventure game/beat ‘em up with action rpg elements. Fight back against the bullies who have made life a living hell for you and your friends. Explore, fight, level up, and eat some pho along the way.

name: Munchie Strikers
description: A Group of ambitious jinn from antagonistic realms fight tooth and nail to snatch the ball, score against their opponents and determine who would become the ruler of the Earth.

name: Leila
description: Enter the world of an everyday woman as you explore her past in this point & click narrative game. Hand-drawn animations bring her memories to life, and thought-provoking puzzles lay bare the reasons behind her choices. Immerse yourself in a story unfolds as you decipher its intricate pieces.

name: Nullschwert
description: A surreal Bullet Hell adventure through a forgetful realm of strange machinery and its bunny-eared overseers. If you persist, the purpose of your incursion may be uncovered. How far are you willing to go?

name: Sunny Side Down, by Muno!
description: Sunny Side Down is a frantic arcade puzzle-platformer where you're a tiny mouse working at a breakfast diner, guiding eggs toward a frying pan while a line of angry customers looms over your head. How long can you last in this hectic work environment without getting fired?

name: Nova X9
description: In Nova X9, become a fearless cyborg girl, and fight against hordes of enemies, snowballing your advantage as you smash through thousands of foes. Survive the relentless onslaught and unleash your skills in this roguelite survival game set in a dark and futuristic world.

name: TacTanks
description: Assemble your tank squadron and lead them to victory in this turn-based strategy game!

name: Valorous
description: Become Valorous! Use your powers of flight, super speed, heat vision, super strength, and x-ray vision to take down enemy bases and save the city from the militia. With exciting events, multiplayer, and stunning graphics, become a legend among heroes and unleash your full potential.

name: Get Slapped!
description: Get Slapped! is a 3rd person slap-stick action comedy fighting game with mind-bending arenas, where you can combat eccentric foes, and climb the ranks to face off against even more ruthless fighters. Prepare to showcase your slap skills like never before!

name: Haxware: Enforcer Games
description: Haxware: Enforcer Games is a an Action Roguelike that focuses on discovering your own magic fusions, & strategic ways to use them. Enforcer Games gives you thousands of ways to develop your own personalized strategy to do it as you face off against foes & challenging bosses!

name: Boat Party
description: Boat Party is a vibrant, four-player, competitive party game full of fun and unique games! Play with your friends, online or locally!

name: Orbit Express
description: Orbit Express is a physics-based roguelike game. Pilot your delivery spacecraft through a procedurally generated galaxy, creating a unique challenge every time you play. Avoid collisions, upgrade your craft, mind your fuel, and master your flying skills, all for a minimum wage!

name: Viral Fear
description: Step into the shoes of a daring live streamer in Viral Fear, a spine-chilling 1 to 4 player co-op adventure. Stealthily maneuver through the woods, destroy ritual skulls, and unravel the secrets of the cult to vanquish the nightmarish entity.

name: Polyroll Pocket
description: An all new, Pocket-Sized adventure starring Polyroll! Kaiser Kiwi has landed on the moon with a diabolical plan to wipe out the Polyrolls. You'll need to uncover secrets, reclaim the stolen batteries from Kiwi's goons, and power up your rocket ship to blast off for the final confrontation!

name: Hank: The Great Unraveling
description: Lucrom City’s notorious asylum has been overrun by a recently caught sadistic mastermind - the Unraveler. He’s willing to negotiate before he starts killing the hostages on one condition. He gets to speak to one person - Hank, his captor.

name: Elemancer
description: Master all 5 elements in this natural movement VR elemental brawler. Choose from hundreds of different attacks to create your own unique bending style.

name: RootKeeper
description: Unknown Warrior, pick up your weapons, plant a variety of plants, resist the surging monsters, and protect the Holy Tree!

name: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival
description: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival is a cutesy physics puzzle game where you have to deliver to the destination as many adorable little chickens as possible. One more thing, Squeeks love to clump up, so what are you waiting for - let’s get rolling!

name: Axe Party VR
description: VR Axe Games

name: Idle Run
description: Idle run is an idle game where your main goal to is run faster and faster by killing enemies, crafting new gear, unlock new recipes, pets, zones and earn achievements!

name: Manaclysm
description: Manaclysm is an online bullet-hell brawler where up to 60 mages battle to gather enough power to escape the destruction of an unstable realm. Slay enemy mages to upgrade your Mana gauge and arsenal of spells. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!

name: A Dog of Flanders
description: A Dog of Flanders is an adventure game based on the novel of the same name by the British author Ouida.

name: Ulton's Quest
description: Ulton's Quest is a cute 2D indie platformer with a pseudo-cyberpunk atmosphere and charming pixel art. Venture into the role of Ulton Gograk, an adorable orc and defeat the fearsome Commander Maximus Tauro before it is too late!

name: Guardians
description: Guardians, an extraordinary action role-playing game that transports you to a captivating universe teeming with danger, discovery, and heroism. Immerse yourself in a sprawling, post-apocalyptic world where chaos-infected creatures roam, and the fate of civilization rests on your shoulders.

name: Our Dark Heart
description: ODH is a story rich, physcological, survival, horror, game with retro flair.

name: Little Monster
description: Little Monster is a — fast paced and fun — beat 'em up game. You play as little monster whose goal is to prevent nightmare spirits from entering our minds while sleeping.

name: Spooky Crew: Mask of the Mysterium
description: Join the Spooky Crew and uncover the secret of the Mask of the Mysterium in this point and click adventure game. An encounter with a masked figure leads the crew to investigate the secrets of a local museum.

name: February of Cards
description: This is a card game where you place 28 cards arranged like a calendar and compete with your opponent by taking the coins placed there and combining them with bonuses obtained by taking them continuously. Choose a player from among 26 alphabet characters and aim for the strongest.

name: Bone Born
description: Bone Born is Topdown, defense, casual and Co-op online game. make your skeleton with your friends and family to defend the infinity waves of demon enemies.

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 5
description: Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.

name: Nok
description: Get ready to Nok it out of the park with this immersive physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a virtual world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging.

name: Dungeon Descent
description: Brace yourself for a thrilling co-op adventure! Delve into the depths of perilous dungeons, face the undead onslaught, and carve your own medieval legend. Craft, strategize, survive - "Will you conquer the darkness?"

name: Hyouteki
description: Master your aim in Hyouteki, the ultimate aim training game. Unparalleled mouse responsiveness and endless customization. Dominate with precision!

name: Rush: Run Up Super High
description: Join this intense MMO 3D precision platformer! Leap, parkour, and climb massive, uncharted locations and compete against 199 others in a race to the top. With a perfect character control system, all you need is focus and patience to smash records and reach unprecedented heights!

name: Anime Slayer
description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through a surrealistic realm in this captivating shooter game. Dive into a mesmerizing world where you find yourself pitted against an eclectic blend of adorable anime-inspired heroines and menacing extraterrestrial creatures.

name: Royalty
description: Royalty is a strategy card game. Manage your population, economy, military, diplomacy, and religion. Enact policies, handle random events, and ensure your dynasty's survival amidst riots, coups, and invasions. Shape the destiny of your kingdom and leave a lasting legacy in Royalty.

name: After Sunset
description: "After Sunset" is a ghost-based deckbuilder roguelike driven by a day-night circle system. Investigate the absurd deserted town to find hidden ghosts. Craft them to compose a unique team, and fight off weird humanoid creatures. In this eerie world, explore a sad story about "DEATH"

name: Ancient Polis
description: Travel back 2600 years to ancient Greece. Build and manage your city (polis) and experience and shape the life of the ancient Greeks on your own terms.

name: Unsane 2
description: Unsane 2 is an arcade style FPS. Run and gun or hack and slash your way through open world and dungeon depths on procedural maps. Leader boards track your best scores against zombies, skeletons, and other baddies.

name: Neo Junk City
description: Dive into Neo Junk City, a cyberpunk adventure where you’re an android detective unraveling your own murky past. Navigate neon streets, engage with unique characters, and race through the rain-soaked city. Uncover secrets in this twist on point-and-click gameplay.

name: Guilded
description: Manage a fantasy adventurer's guild and make a lot of money... I mean save the kingdom from a looming threat! Recruit heroes, create quests to send them on and upgrade your guild's facilities.

name: Botanical Warden
description: Botanical Warden is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder in which plants are used to fight strategic challenging turn-based combat. Evolve your plants with artificial selection and hybridization to create endless possibilities in your quest to defeat other tribes and conquer a barren island.

name: Stronghold Conquest
description: In this thrilling Tower Defense - type game, you will become the main defender of your kingdom. Build powerful guns and strategically deploy them on the battlefield to fend off waves of incoming enemies. Your goal is to protect your territory and destroy all threats using various types of guns.

name: Mage and Monsters II
description: Recruit a hero to lead your army, and use spells while they fight for you. Mage & Monsters 2 is an active auto battler, where you choose to either enhance the strength of your hero, reinforce the might of your army, or increase the power of your spells.

name: Cart Legends
description: Battle your way to being a legend in the world of carts!

name: Team Five
description:
Five animals. Five exits. Five Minutes.

Demolish your friends online in a race against the clock. Boost your weapons to the max, annihilate the map so even its mother won't recognize it, and get the hell out!

name: Tercios: Honor and Glory
description: Strategy and army management in real time of the 16th and 17th century of the Spanish Tercios. Take command of the army, relive the story of these brave men and their exploits, get resources, manage your soldiers, take cities, resist sieges and defeat your enemies in epic battles.

name: NeoCars
description: Original and immersive cyberpunk driving game. Use your drifts to make your lines deadly for your opponents. Solo, local cooperative and online multiplayer modes. Play on a team with players of the same or different colors. Immersive soundtrack. Unique and stimulating gaming experience.

name: Exilium
description: Exilium is a fast-paced Roguelike Shooter where skill and item synergy are crucial for survival. Explore a variety of play styles with dozens of weapons at your disposal. Collect items to enhance your abilities, but be wary of descending into madness...

name: Hideout
description: The city in war. Life in danger. You make your way through the fights and reach the old hideout. Survival depends on the mind and the resources. There is very little food and electricity. As you lose your sanity, the presence of paranormal entities increases. You will have to fight for survival.

name: Eventide Matter
description: Eventide Matter is an action-packed 2D arena shooter. Survive as long as possible, upgrade your ship, unleash your godlike potential, and shape the destiny of the universe!

name: Artifice
description: Adventure across two worlds, fight cyborg managers, learn magic, and save the world from a sentient AI in this turn-based RPG inspired by the classics of the genre.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Reverse Blue
description: The Bright Blue Sky... Is Hiding Something.

name: Dino Path Trail
description: Dino Path Trail is a journey across a Wild West full of dangers in a world where dinosaurs have never gone extinct. Set up your camp and bring it along thanks to your classic western wagon towed by dinosaurs. Explore canyons, mountains and swamps and survive the harsh environment and predators.

name: Diehexegy
description: Diehexegy is a hex grid turn-based 4x game with a unique twist: your armies are composed of dice. It has multiple victory conditions and straightforward gameplay. Challenge friends or fellow strategists in asynchronous multiplayer matches.

name: Dreadwinter
description: Dreadwinter is a single-player, fantasy coffee shop RPG, where the game's story and experience is centered around how you play. Whether you want to run a thriving business, explore the world, or just make good coffee, how you run Dreadwinter is up to you!

name: Rivencrest
description: Unleash strategic mastery in a captivating team-based adventure, as you assemble and customize diverse squads to conquer challenging levels, vanquish formidable foes and unravel the mysteries of the village.

name: The Solace Paradox
description: Work together with your friends to explore a magical island, solve puzzles, and unlock the mystery of The Solace Paradox in this 2-4 player cooperative puzzle adventure.

name: My Littlest Skeleton
description: My Littlest Skeleton is a cosy and relaxing simulation where you care for your very own little Skeleton chum! Pull your unique Skeleton back from the depths of the Nether Region. Attend to their needs, maintain their furnishings, choose from a variety of environments for your Skeleton to call home.

name: The Dream Office
description: Welcome to "The Dream Office," an immersive game that allows you to step into the shoes of a master office designer and renovator. Prepare to embark on a thrilling journey where you'll transform drab and cluttered workspaces into stunning, productive havens that would make anyone's dreams come true.

name: Undying Fortress
description: Wield your magic sword against the monsters that fill a mysterious tower, and uncover the secrets of the past!

name: Triplane Furball
description: Prepare for intense dogfights in Triplane Furball, a 2D aerial combat game. Conquer singleplayer campaigns or engage in customizable multiplayer battles against friends. Skill, precision, and lightning-fast reflexes are key to victory!

name: Searchbar Detective
description: Searchbar Detective is a 2D Mystery Game set in a virtual world in which you use your searchbar to solve crimes and uncover conspiracies.

name: The Happy Card Battle
description: Pure original storyline and new gameplay, featuring 14 unique heroes, 54 playing cards, over 100 Elf Hearts, and over 100 selectable cards, creating a unique fast gaming experience with only three to five minutes. More heroes, skills, and cards are still expanding

name: Dungeon's Anima
description: Dungeon's Anima is an Action Roguelite for up to 4 players where you play as the Shadowmancer, the last undead foot-soldier now imbued with the final vestiges of the Dungeon Heart's power; collect the souls of your enemies to reclaim your dominion from the hands of the Human Empire.

name: The Hungry Town
description:
The Hungry Town is an interactive visual novel in a dark fantasy setting with vampires.
You are a young vampire who has been drawn into a violent confrontation between two generations of vampires. You will have to choose a side or decide to stay true to yourself.

name: Ploko
description: Embark on Ploko, the enchanting VR dream-builder! Create mini-worlds, piece by piece, and watch them come alive. With themed levels, a friendly companion cat, and immersive VR features, it's the cozy VR experience you've been craving!

name: CookFriends
description: CookFriends is a cozy open world, cooking & delivery game. And we have splitscreen co-op! Gather a friend and have fun in this tiny, but content heavy world! Where you need to take care of your own restaurant, make deliveries, customize your bike, meet citizens, solve puzzles and enjoy stories!

name: The Witch of Shunrald
description: The Witch of Shunrald is an isometric action-adventure game that incorporates storytelling elements. Players can directly control the witch's staff using mouse controls, enabling ranged attacks, close combat attacks, and manipulation of certain objects in the environment.

name: Tatonka the Space Whale
description: Sci-fi, Space themed. 2D, Fast Paced, Twin Stick shooter. Play as Tatonka in her story to reunite her family or play as her and other characters in a rogue lite type wave survivor.

name: Shattered Reflections: The Abyss Within
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating perspective of Evelyn as you embark on an exploration of a haunting realm where realities become distorted. This psychological horror game offers a compelling experience that unravels the enigmatic secrets concealed within a dark era.

name: Containcorp
description: Containcorp is a management simulation game inspired by the SCP Universe and driven by AI Storytellers. Construct your base, design containment areas, and employ brilliant minds to study anomalies. Where Gunplay, Psychology, Medicine, Biomes, and more blend seamlessly.

name: Remnants of Dawn
description: A string of campus killings. A newly-turned vampire struggling to adjust. A monster hunter seeking answers. Worlds collide as Dante Jones and Nick Torres, both in danger of being accused of the crimes, team up to reveal the true culprit in this chilling supernatural horror visual novel.

name: Mewnition
description: A co-op adventure game for 1-16 players, set in a voxel environment teeming with gargantuan beasts and powerful artifacts. Forage for resources, fortify your arenas, and fight fearsome foes as you reshape the world and uncover the truth of how it came to be.

name: Khaligrad
description: Slip on the boots of a freshly-arrived officer in Khaligrad, a captivating strategy game that plunges you into the heart of a grueling military campaign. Lead your battalion for the Empire or the Union, with intense turn-based battles and unforgiving management phases.

name: Afterland
description: Afterland is a roguelite FPS Cooperative, each game is a new adventure, new monsters, weapons, bonuses and dungeons will appear. To win the game you must explore several dimensions without dying. The adventure can be played with up to 4 players in co-op.

name: DumbSquad
description: Fight and survive in this post-apocalyptic world, infested by wild mutated monsters! Challenge your skill as a Hunter against these dangerous beasts!

name: Nine Nights
description: 《Nine Nights》is an indie hardcore action-adventure game. You will become the killer Ci Lang, escape and fight back in the crisis-ridden world of Nine Nights. You have to rely on the high martial arts skills tenacious fighting, struggling to lead to the road to revenge.

name: Another World in the Morning
description: The player must choose one of three jobs to defeat the enemies of the other world. Each job has a different special skill, and it is a 2D platformer game with the goal of sealing the demon king by defeating bosses and obtaining stones suitable for attributes.

name: Scamper
description: You are a rat. Your fear response will be tested.

name: Annum Crossroads
description: Navigate a vast wilderness, battling countless enemies with the goal of liberating a desperate civilization from tyranny.

name: Limbs Inc
description: Physics simulation mayhem inspired by QWOP and Happy Wheels. Craft, program and control robots, complex machines and vehicles. Build devious obstacle courses to drive online players insane!

name: Canopy
description: Canopy is a non-violent exploration crafting game set in the heart of the rainforest. Gather your friends and embark on an unforgettable cooperative adventure, where camaraderie is key, and teamwork is essential.

name: Sinder Blade
description: Sinder Blade is a dark fantasy action roguelike where you combine powerful skills to create game-breaking combos. Use both fire and lightning to unleash absolute destruction! Discover more mighty Sinders, find legendary artifacts, and learn more devastating skills to conquer the battlefield.

name: Flip Joy
description: Welcome to our casual game! Get ready to challenge your brain. Gameplay: You will face a grid of 16 cards with their backs facing up. Flip two cards at a time to find matching patterns and eliminate them. Your goal is to clear the grid. Completing levels unlocks CG rewards.

name: The Friends We Left Behind
description: The Friends We Left Behind is a puzzle-solving horror game where you must survive different "escape room" situations to win. Play 5 separate bone-chilling levels with unique gameplay featuring different Imaginary Friends. Play solo on your PC in a dark room and volume turned up high, you chicken.

name: Crossroads Inn 2
description: Immerse yourself in Crossroads Inn 2, an enhanced real-time management sim set in the mesmerising fantasy realm of Delcrys. Build your inn, manage the menu, services, staff, and guests, and become famous in every corner of the continent. Your inn, your tale - your world to explore.

name: The Adventure of Ted and the Lost Magic Crystals
description: Ted is interested in finding the lost magic crystals the source of life for the squirrel's kingdom. for the reward, of course, a chest full of gold from the King of Squirrel's kingdom.
